title: Audiomack: Download New Music Offline Free
description:
Stream and download the best new songs, albums, and playlists for free and play them offline data-free!  Browse music from top categories like Hip-Hop, Rap, R&B, EDM, Afropop, and Reggae on the Audiomack free music app. Download songs and even listen offline, without using your data!

Audiomack provides streaming and free download access to the newest and hottest tracks, right at your fingertips. Our free music download feature allows you to play your favorite songs offline, and our proprietary ‚ÄúTrending‚Äù section shows you the best albums and songs that are hot right now.

KEY FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Find & stream music and mixtapes that are new or trending. Be the first of your friends to be up on what‚Äôs next.
‚Ä¢ Download songs and albums for offline, data-free listening.
‚Ä¢ Unlimited listening & streaming - play as much Hip-Hop, Afrobeat, Electronic, Reggae & dancehall music as you want.
‚Ä¢ Favorite tracks, albums, and playlists and easily search, browse, and shuffle your favorites collection.

comments: Well this app is really cool cause you can download music for free. But recently I went into the app and went to my favorites and all the music was gone. All it said was "having trouble connecting" but I have perfect connection. My downloaded music is still there. Right now I'm stuck and I really don't know what to do üò¨

This app was great, my favourite music downloader to use until I some of my downloaded/offline songs randomly dissapeared. Then today when I was trying to download music it would take ages then after a while it would say it was downloaded. But when I checked my offline thing the songs weren't even there which means I couldn't listen to them offline. I deleted the app and got it again in hope that I would fix it and I had to download my songs again but the same thing happened.

I love listening to music and I have no problem with using this app ‚ô°üíú i used to have no problems but now when i try to download music sometimes it does not download the whole song and when it does work properly i listen to a song but then it always pauses on its own other than that i love it so if this is effective only on me then im sorry but if its not then please fix this thank you.

I started paying for the premium subscription to get rid of the adds, but some of them still display on the bottom of the page. When I try to close them, the app tells me to upgrade to premium to get rid of adds. Please fix this and I will update to 5 stars. This is a great app with tons of good user playlists and a huge library of music though, so it is worth a download.

I've been using this app for quite some time, I love it that almost all the songs I want to download are on this app. However, I don't like it that so many people put their custom version of a song I REALLY want to have and the actual song, without it being "remixed", isn't available. Other than that, it truly is a fantastic free song app and I recommend that anyone looking to download music use it. Also the fact that you can listen to all your songs offline, is really awesome.

title: Voice Recorder
description:
Voice recorder
Voice recorder - Audio recorder
Best recorder for sound recording  with high quality
Voice recorder application is totally free. It is simple and easy to use. You can reliably record your meetings, personal notes, speeches, lectures, songs. There is no time limits. This application can record most of your sound and voice. You can record a business meeting, a lecture, an interview. This app is a best choice. Other names which you can call it: voice recorder, audio recorder, sound recorder.

Features:
1. record voice with high quality
2. simple user interface, easy to use.
3. Supported operations in this Version
- Recording with high quality.
- Format file: mp3, ogg
- Play, pause, stop audio file.
- Send/Share your recording.
- Delete your recording right from the app.
- Save the recording file.
- live audio spectrum analyzer
- mp3 encoding with adjustable sample rate (8-44 kHz)
- recording in background (even when display is off)
- microphone gain calibration tool
- save/pause/resume/cancel recording process control
- easy to use recordings list
- send/share a recording via email, sms, mms, facebook, whatsapp, dropbox, etc.
- not support call recorder

Hope you love this application.

comments: This is the absulute best music so far. It records and plays st same time. thats cool. You easily throw a complete song together. The sound is clean. The app is buggy or invasive and its easy to use. I love the audio picking up frequencies I am assuming. It's my favorite app. No complaints. I'd happily pay for it. I haven't thought of that. Ill look around for you subscription or let me know how.

I didn't realize my volume was down but to my surprise it recorded everything, I'm highly impressed. The first time I used it, I recorded an event from 8 to 5 and forgot to turn it off, it recorded thru the next day, our Sunday Service 7:45-11:00 when I realized it was still recording. I turned it off and laughed., still surprised at the great quality. I love it!

Very useful! Got it to do an interview for school. Works well. Phone can record from a decent distance away and plays back audio very clearly. Very simple to use and playback. Also saved audio tracks don't take up much space which is nice. I recorded a 45 minute conversation and had no issues. Just press record and you're good to go. Highly recommend!

This app is great! I've been struggling with being very forgetful for awhile, especially of important things like stuff discussed in doctor appointments. I downloaded this and have been using it to record certain doctors visits (after asking of course), so I can then play them back at a later time if I forgot certain things we talked about. It has been very helpful and the audio quality is great! I also like that you can see all of the bars moving during a recording so you know it is working.

Pretty good. You cannot cast to any device so I had to download an app that will. Please try to fix it. Also, it makes it sound all scratchy so then I cannot listen, but that only happens sometimes. I only use it for my voice, but sometimes it makes it sound really bad during my voice lessons so then I have to delete it and it sucks. Please fix this too! But it also works pretty well, so that is why I am giving it 3 stars but just try and fix it, then i will give it a better result for others!!!

title: AudioLab - Audio Editor Recorder & Ringtone Maker
description:
AudioLab - THE ONLY AUDIO EDITOR APP YOU WILL EVER NEED 

AudioLab is Most Advance, Modern, Fast, Professional Audio Editor which have all the features you would ever want.
Features like Audio Trimming ( cut / crop / copy / paste / add silence / fade / undo / redo ), Audio Mixing ( Mix Four Audio, Change Speed & Pitch, have all DJ effect options and Filters ), detailed Tag Editing, Audio Merging, Audio Recorder, Audio Converter and many more features... with Instant Preview to monitor every step of your modification make AudioLab different from other

‚ûú Want to Record quality audio?

‚ô™ Audio Cutter / Audio Trimmer / MP3 Cutter
Simple, Modern and Easy to use User Interface to precisely cut the best part of Your Audio (up to 100 ms) Song for using in Music File, Mobile Ringtone, Notification, AlarmTone.
Add Silence, Delete a Portion of Audio, Copy Paste any part of Audio with Edit Stack to easily navigate you through your editing and help you to easily undo or redo your work.

Audio Recorder for recording your voice and music with desired Source, Channel, Sample rate, Audio Format, and advance option like Noise Suppressor, Automatic Gain, and Skip Silence

Split any audio file into two parts and reverse any audio file with Instant Preview

AudioLab help you to Convert Text to Speech with phone's built-in Text to speech engine

title: Audio Recorder
description:
Audio Recorder - Voice Recorder - Tape Recorder
Audio Recorder is mostly known as free, professional and easy dictaphone for Android devices. Use it for record voice memos, talks, singing, music and sounds in high quality. Designed for everybody, especially students, journalists and musicians. Tags can be easily added to any part of the recording by one tap. Voice Recorder recording quality is limited by the quality of device's microphone. 

Group recording
Group all your vocal recordings into defined categories. Mark your favourite talks and memos. Place tags, choose colors and icons. Save on external SD card.

Mark Important Fragments
Simply click the "Pin" button while recording to attach bookmark at current time. All pins will be displayed on the playback timeline.

High quality recorder
With two simple taps configure all recording options. Choose your sample rate. Enable stereo recording and silence remover. Use Android‚Äôs built-in effects to remove noise, cancel echo and control gain. Record your voice in HQ from one of built-in microphones.

Wireless Transfer
Use Wi-Fi transfer to export data to your computer fast and easy without any additional software. Just make sure that you are connected to the same network and you can start transferring.

This app is the perfect tape voice recorder for anyone looking to record a vocal note or a memo while keeping their hands free.

Pro Features:
  - automatically attach current location to your recordings
  - protect access to app by pin code
  - recording in mp3 format

All Features:
 - Create category and group your audio notes
 - HD Sound Recording
 - SD Card Saving
 - Attach bookmark at specific time
 - Smooth audio playback
 - Android app shortcuts support
 - Recording in background
 - Integration with widget
 - Silence skip, gain reduction, echo canceler
 - WiFi file sharing 
 - PRO: Attach current location
 - PRO: App pin protection
 - PRO: MP3 Recording

If there are any problems, please contact me via e mail.
Feel free to leave a review

comments: I've been searching for so long, an audio recorder that let's you speed up the recordings while listening. And even add time bookmarks! Amazing. It's good that you can categorize the recordings but if the app doesn't save the actual files in different folders or add the category name to the file's name then it's not a big practicality.
Records okay, but has weird glitches when playing it back. Also, if I have more than 10 recordings it puts them out of order, because it sees the 10 and 11 as being after number 1.

Simply the best free recording app Easy to organize files with customizable folders Easy to replay files with features like play back speed and bookmarks I'm using this for school and is super easy to add a lecture to it's course folder Keep those ads coming
When you're responsible for meeting minutes, shorthand just doesnt do the job anymore. Thank you AUDIO RECORDER for catching everything I missed!‚ù§
Not a bad feel to the app but it is disfunctional. I recorded an imoportant interview almost 2 hours long and the next day it is gone. Completely deleted from the app.

title: Music Player - Audio Player
description:
Powerful equalizer, Quick search all music and audio files, Easy to support all music & audio file formats, Custom background skin.

One of the most gorgeous and powerful music player for Android! 

You can manage your musics easily, Music Player will guide you easily to find all the music in your phone.
This music player is not only based on artists or albums, but also based on the folder structure. And more than 3 desktop widgets make your music play never been so easy.
Over 20 background skins to make your music player look more outstanding, and these also make your music player get the next level experience.
The unique equalizer make your music sounds like you've never had before.


Key Features:
* Browse and play your music by albums, artists, genres, songs, playlists, folders, and album artists.
* Lyric support. Automatic scanning all the lyric files , and matching the most appropriate lyrics file for your songs. 
* 3 simple home screen WIDGETS (4x1,2x2,4x1).
* Notification STATUS support: display album artwork, title and artist, play/pause, skip forward and stop CONTROLS in notification status.
* Five band equalizer.
* Search online hot music videos
* Set as Play Next song
* Trim/Edit Music file, Free to make customize ringtones.
* 22 types of pre-set music tone for your choice, or you can manually adjust the equalizer. 
* SHAKE IT feature: give your phone a shake to play next/previous song
* Gorgeous background skins, 20+ Gorgeous background images for your choice. You also can choose your own picture as background. 
* Edit the song details, now you don't worry about the song without album name or artist name.
* Headset support. Support one button and multiple buttons headsets. Leave your device in the pocket!
* Music Library wide SEARCH. Find all your music never been so easy.
* Custom Playlist, set albums, artists, genres, folders songs to playlist
* Show recent play list
* Headset/Bluetooth Controls

To learn more about the advanced settings, please feel free to down and have a try.

We have always believed that music player experience can be something more. This is exactly why we have created this Ultra Music player.
NOTE:
This app is not a music downloader.

comments: This is a great app it plays and sounds great...the only problem I'm having is I made like 7 or 8 playlists and for some reason Everytime I turn off the app and don't use it for 24 hours or longer it erases my playlists..the album and name will still be there but when I click on it has 0 songs in all of them..is there something need to turn on\off?..please help me figure this out it's very frustrating...lol..other than that I have no complaints it's an awesome app!!!! Thank you.

The only reason I gave this 2 stars is because it's useful for storing music. The only reasons I'm keeping it... it's a pre-install app in my phone and, it holds songs and original clips that I recorded and don't want to lose. Otherwise it would go straight in the trash. I don't like the layout and I absolutely HATE all of the ads that pop up everytime I open it to listen to music!

I liked the app, easy to use. BUT i have a problem - some of my music folder's names are very long, and i can't see their full name. Can you please add this feature? I mean, that if a folder name is too long it would move / slide in a loop from left to right or right to left depending on the language used. Thank you.

Honestly, in my own opinion, this music player is better than the one I had previously, the one I had previously repeated the same music until you opened the app and manually selected the song you wanted, but this music player is better than that...
VERY GOOD. With this app I was able to set the levels in a way that I filtered out some very distracting sound artifacts from my noise canceling headphones. Not bad for a free app!

comments: Itd be nice if it were possible to fast forward by pressing a button, not just skip to next song. You should also make it possible to add cover art for the album by searching for it within the player so you dont have to switch between the internet and the app. Same thing for the lyrics. Theres times when i go to edit the details of a song and after changing and saving them, the music player shows the song with the wrong information still.

I downloaded this app as an alternative to my previous MP3 music player due to loss of privacy with the last App. However, this App works just as well, if not better as the last App, (Audify Music Player, for those wondering.) and I highly recommend the download! Navigating the App is simple, organizing songs is a breeze, functionality is great, all in all, a winner in my book.

Adds... more bothersome than in my previous app which presumably spied on me. Taggs are not working, or rather it worked once until it gave up on me. Cant give more than 3 stars since i just downloaded it. Minus side also is that it doesnt recognize audio books (feature that i miss). Are there any positive things? At does seem to work. Themes and appearance looks better.

Aside from a few bugs I really love this app! I found that when I go to my artists tab and sort by ascending, it only shows a few artists, although when I sort by descending it shows all of them, but I don't like sorting by descending :/ Still sorting by artist, the preview screen that shows all the artists also inaccurately displays how many songs or albums I have by the artist, and when I click on the artist, then it shows me a completely different amount, although at least it's accurate then.

An amazing app no anoying ads, does everything it's supposed to, and background play. If I could rate more than 5 I would, this is a really good app. üëç Edit: When trying to put lyrics in with copy and paste for a specific song it wouldn't work, and I know it's not because I copied and pasted it wouldn't work even when i spelled somthing random and tried to save it. Not a big issue but should be fixed soon for people who care about it.

title: Audible Audiobooks, Original Stories & Series
description:
Audible, an Amazon company, is home to best-selling audio entertainment across all genres including sci-fi and fantasy, mysteries, thrillers, self-motivation, memoirs, ebooks, and more. Every month, members can select two Audible Originals from our fresh selection at no additional cost.  

Start an Audible trial for 30 days and widen your world one voice at a time.

AUDIBLE, THE MOST COMPELLING STORIES, THE MOST INSPIRING VOICES, THE BEST PLACE TO LISTEN  

Explore new releases, series, best sellers, novels, memoirs, comedy, mysteries and thrillers, sci-fi, and more‚Äîwhatever your passion, you're sure to find the perfect listen: 
- Hear something new. Discover Audible Originals created just for audio including exclusive audiobooks, documentaries, and scripted shows that you can‚Äôt hear anywhere else.  
- Stay informed. Get all your news in one place with free daily updates in the Audible app from The New York Times, Wall Street Journal, and The Washington Post. 
- Entertainment for all ages. Audible‚Äôs Kids & Young Adult library has everything from classics, bed time stories, bible stories, to modern young adult literature. Get kids reading with Audible! 

FEATURES FOR AUDIOBOOK LISTENERS  
- 1 credit per month for any Audible audiobook regardless of price.  
- Two free Audible Originals every month.  
- Access to Audible Daily Deals, with audiobooks available for as little as $2.95.  
- Members get 30% off any additional titles they purchase.  
- Free and easy exchanges, swap anytime.  
- Keep your library of titles forever, even if you cancel.  
- Listen anywhere, anytime when you download your audiobooks to listen offline in the Audible app, whether you‚Äôre commuting, shopping, working out, or just on the go. 
- The Audible app keeps your place, even when you switch devices 
- Access Audible across all your devices including Alexa-enabled devices, Amazon Kindle, audio players, and any Bluetooth speaker.  
- Always ad-free!   

 SELF-DEVELOPMENT AND EXCLUSIVE GUIDED WELLNESS PROGRAMS 
New year, new month, new week, focus on your self-improvement and self-care! 
Books to get you started in the new year
-	How to Win Friends & Influence People (Unabridged)
-	Atomic Habits (Unabridged)
-	The 5 Second Rule (Unabridged)
-	The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People

Members also get unlimited access to guided fitness and meditation programs led by certified coaches and trainers. Many are updated weekly.  

 AUDIBLE ESCAPE 
Discover a world of romance! Audible Escape subscribers get unlimited access to thousands love stories right in the app.  

 AUDIOBOOKS ON OUR MUST-LISTEN LIST  
- Where the Crawdads Sing by Delia Owens  
- Becoming by Michelle Obama  
- Can‚Äôt Hurt Me by David Goggins  
- Educated: A Memoir by Tara Westover  

READY TO GET STARTED?  
1. Download the free Audible app  
2. Sign in securely with your Amazon account using an Email address, or Mobile number. 
3. Sign up for your 30-day free trial  
4. Choose any audiobook to get started. Your first one is free.  

Note: app version 2.48 and above required to sign-in with a mobile number


Happy listening!

summary: The world‚Äôs largest selection of audiobooks. Listen anywhere, cancel anytime.
recentChanges: Bug fixes and enhancements.
comments: Excellent. Great selection of books and cheap audio books, especially if you DL on Kindle first. If you have Kindle Unlimited and your book is borrowed under that, then you get the book for a discounted rate. I've bought and listened to around 80 books and the quality is excellent. The app is easy to use and very user friendly. When looking for the next book in a series, it prompts you with it at the end of the current book. When searching an author in the store it won't show you books you have.

I have been using audible every single day since I created my account, and I genuinely love it. Audible IMO has a very reasonable subscription model, and the sales have been great for me (especially since I'm into sci-fi and fantasy). There is a great selection of books, the app is intuitive and easy to use, although it's missing some key features like organizing library, and customer service is 10/10 every time.

I do lots of driving for work. Audible presents a welcome variety from music. I was disappointed to discover not all books and titles can be found on Audible. I am happy to see them continuously expand the digital catalog. Warning! Some narrators can be painfully monotonous. Make sure you listen to the samples before you buy! Overall, I love the functionality of the app!

Love the app overall. The one problem i have experienced is that every now and then when i return to the app, the audiobook position has been lost and has returned to beginning. I then have to skip forward incrementally to try to find my place. I have started using the bookmark feature regularly but this means turning the screen on every time. Hopefully this can be fixed in an update. Thanks.

As much as I love audiobooks I hate this app. The search function for finding new books seems to have changed for the worse. Now I can't refine my search at all. There stupidly used to be two ways to search for new books, they seem to have gotten rid of the better one. Used to be where the search options were like they are on a browser, but now you have to rely on the terrible search bar at the top which doesn't let you refine your search anymore.

comments: Very good, however when naming a finished recording the option to rename the recording doesn't take effect. You have to rename the recording after having accepted the automated title given. If this is ever to be fixed, I would like for the automated title function to remain the same but the option to rename the file needs to take effect when renamed with the first offer to rename the file. Hope this makes sense. Otherwise, good experience, with as little as I've explored.

This app has been perfect for my school projects. If you need to do an oral presentation but have no after use of a fancy computer microphone, this app is perfect. I just send the recordings through email then attach them to my PowerPoint. Very easy!

I mean it works.....but why am I asked to name the recording after I'm done recording, only for my list to look like the generic file names? In other words, it's not saving the name I give the file and now I have to go back and listen to every recording to remember which song is which. Not cool, fix it or I'm out.

This app works REALLY well, the sound is great, and can record even from far off. The only down side is that its really hard to find a particular spot in the recordeding becuase theres no, 30 sec backward or forward. Other than that, i recomened this app!

Downloaded this app because I needed to record my music lessons. After a very helpful lesson the app wouldent let me enter my recordings. My only option was to uninstall or to force stop which causes errors so... ya I'm mad, only had the app for an hour and this was my first recording on it. Do not recomend!!

title: Hide Photos, Video and App Lock - Hide it Pro
description:
Hide Photos, Videos, Apps, Messages, Calls in your phone. COMPLETELY FREE and UNLIMITED

Hide photos & videos from your photo gallery and access them easily using a secret PIN code. Now you can easily share your phone without worrying about privacy. 

-- About the app ‚Äì

The app is cleverly disguised as "Audio Manager" in the App Drawer.
Disguises itself as an Audio Manager app which can be used to turn the volumes up and down. but if you Long press on the Audio Manager title the actual Hide It Pro app will launch, which is basically your SECRET VAULT of hidden photos, videos, messages, apps etc.
You can Hide photos, videos, or any other files in your Private Vault

Features

1.) App disguised behind a fully functional Audio Manager (Other disguises like Calculator etc. are available)
2.) Categorize media into hidden folders of your choice
3.) Free Cloud backup of your files
4.) App Disappears from recent apps list, can't be tracked
5.) Gallery with integrated Slideshow and sharing to WhatsApp, WeChat, Facebook etc.
6.) Integrated Video player with support for VLC player, MPlayerX etc.
7.) Multiple lock screen options - Pin, Password, Pattern
8.) Fingerprint unlock
9.) Escape pin/password for times when you get caught
10.) Built in encryption tool to secure your most important files
11.) Other Features like Secret Chatting, Private Messaging / Calls, Private Browsing, Locking Apps.
12.) Hide app icon from the app drawer of phone

etc.
There are a lot more features like custom slideshows, batch delete, share, unhide, move data between albums, sort files and folders to your liking etc.

Please email us you have any issues, If the app doesn't install properly do a reinstall, that would solve 99% the problems

Contact us at: 
Email : support@hideitpro.com
Twitter: @hideitpro
Facebook: fb.com/hideitpro
Web : http://hideitpro.com
Download for PC/Mac
https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hide-it-pro/jaebfnmmkfdadhldnncpbgbghhgmdddc
IPhone/iPad:
http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/hide-it-pro/id523488488?ls=1&mt=8

comments: Downloaded this app as a companion app for App Locker. -|- It is not completely ad-free. The ad banner is subtle and not very obtrusive. The only problem is, sometimes it takes a couple seconds for the ad banner to load and when it does it changes the placement of the menu items; sometimes as you are attempting to select one. -|- You CAN NOT hide icons in the app drawer without root access. -|- This app is pretty straight forward and easy to use.

I use the audio manager screen. It used to have an option to hold the "audio manager" words for a number of seconds before taking you to the password screen. I got a new phone, and now I don't have that option. Now if I simply touch the words...even if by accident...the secret is revealed. I know about the escape password, but I'd rather not even allow my nosey significant other to get that far. Used to be a 5. Dropped at least 1.5 points for me for getting rid of that feature.

I am using this app from last 4-5 years. It's having very good features and been working amazing but since I've updated it's new version, developed app s been deleting my vault storage. My all photos and other media has been disappeared and backup sync date is also clear. M not understanding why but this app is now eating media without any backup. This is happened thrice in a week.

Best Hide App Ever! Been using it for years and am happy to report that the ads are no more than a small banner at the top. I tried to give some others a go and they will do full screen ads. Not this! Easy to use and ads are not a pain!

This app is great but there's a problem when this new update i cannot see a thumbnail of all my video i added i can only see the name of the video but no thumbnail at all . It needed to be fix because it's annoying for me to find my hidden favorite video if i can only see a tittle .

title: Audio MP3 Cutter Mix Converter and Ringtone Maker
description:
The most powerful and complete Audio Editor! It has all the features you would ever want in an Audio Editor!! Trim Audio ‚Äì MP3 Cutter for Ringtones, Merge two or more audio files, Mix Audio Clips, Change Metadata fields like Art Cover, Music  Album name etc, Convert from one format to another - MP3, AAC, WAV ‚Ä¶ and the list of app features goes on!!

App is completely FREE!! No limits!

>>>> Features <<<<

‚ûú MP3 Cutter: Select the best part from the Song then trim and cut the desired part of the song for using in Ringtone, Notification tones, Alarm tones. Inbuilt player for easy selection of ringtone cutter start location, end cut location and waveform support. Mp3 cutter supports cutting of MP3, AAC, WAV, M4A, AMR etc.
‚ûú Easily choose the Songs, other audio files from the list. You can search the list of songs. Also Music, Ringtones, Notifications, Alarms are marked separately so that one can choose easily. Also songs are listed alphabetically, so that one can choose by just browsing as well.
‚ûú Ringtone Setting: Set Trimmed audio as Ringtone, Notification Tone, Alarm Tone. Apart from default ringtone maker, you can also use ringtone cutter for a particular contact.
‚ûú Audio Mixing Tool: Mix Audio of two songs to create remixes. Same or any format songs can be remixed. You can also choose the Volume, for instance you can keep one song at low volume and another at high volume in your mashups.
‚ûú Merge Audio: Merge two or more Audio Clips. You can merge any number of Audio clips and make a unique tone with ringtone cutter. Merging of different formats is possible for eg. One MP3 file and another WAV music. . It also supports Fade In/ Fade Out support thus giving a professional output.
‚ûú Metadata Editor: You can change a number of metadata tags of a Song like ‚Äì Song Title tag, Cover Art, Music Album name, Singer Name/ Artist, Genre, Composer, Year, Track number and more. This gives you enhanced control and professional audio editor features with mp3 cutter. You can choose a photo from your gallery for using in art cover in the tag editor.
‚ûú MP3 Converter: Easily convert from one format to another. Supports a large number of formats like - MP3, AAC, WAV, M4A encoder etc. You can also choose the sample rate like 32 Kb, 64, 128, 192 etc in mp3 converter.
‚ûú Supports large number of formats in all the features - MP3 Cutter, Merge, Metadata Song Editor etc.
‚ûú Easily access your music creations. Music output list is well organized, stored in different tabs like Trimmed Audio has the cut mp3 files, Merged files, Metadata change files & Format Converter files. You can browse your music and search. You can play a particular file, set as default ringtone. You can also use ringtone cutter for a particular contact.
‚ûú Share your creations with the world!  Share on Faceboook, Whatsapp, email and more.
‚ûú Mp3 Player: Inbuilt Mp3 player in the app.
‚ûú Recorder for recording your voice and music. Use these recordings in ringtone maker, remixes etc. .
‚ûú Super Fast processing & rendering!
‚ûú Intuitive & Modern UI

Get the most powerful Audio Editor with mp3 cutter app and see what you have been missing! Create best song tracks, ringtone cutter, remixes, shorten music, mashups, tag editor and much more with this tool!

App uses FFmpeg under permission of LGPL.

comments: I was going to write a long winded review but, brevity is wit. So simply, just try this app. You won't regret it. It does almost everything you might need to create custom mp3 files for your mobile. Conversion of video and other audio formats to mp3, trim or merge, and editing of tags and filenames is here. You can share your edited files with other apps too. It just works.

Firstly, the Ads cover so much of the screen that it's hard to see where the controls are. Secondly, it doesn't tell WHAT FORMAT the files are being converted to. I simply wanted to trim an .mp3 file to upload to a site. Instead it converted the file (without telling me) to an .mpeg file, which is unusable for that particular site. I know people have to make money in this society, but when Ads take precedence over quality programming, it just sucks.

It's a great app and I've been using it since 2017. However, there /are/ way too many ads that pop up in your face every two seconds, but the full version is like 2 dollars so to be honest I wouldn't complain much about that. A feature I'd love to see added is a speed adjuster of some sorts, I think that would make the app go from good to great. Overall a decent app, and I love the tag editor feature.

Very popular, perhaps easy to use, but lacking important options. If I want good audio quality recordings with my Lenovo, I have to choose WAV format. This smartphone uses only one mic, but records unnecessarily in stereo, spending twice the real amount of data. This program does not allow to eliminate the redudant audio channel, making all conversions (mp3, ogg, etc.) and editions (trimming) unnecessary big. It is alsi very slow converting WAVS into MP3. There are better options.

Works exact i was searchin for....and plz add these features in update too..1)crossfade 2)normalise for even audio 3) optn to select multiple files at same time to merge...selecting one by one is frustrating 4)slide feature in merge to arrange order fast..up..nd down takes too much time.

title: SoundCloud - Music & Audio
description:
üåü What‚Äôs next in music is first on SoundCloud üåü

SoundCloud is more than a streaming service, it‚Äôs an open global community for anyone to upload any sound for immediate discovery. 

Be the first to hear new tracks, connect directly with fellow fans and your favorite artists in real time, and support the future of music with every play, like, repost and comment.

Get SoundCloud FREE:

- Access the most diverse catalog of content 
- Discover millions of emerging and established artists, DJs and podcasters
- Listen to music that exists nowhere else
- Get suggested tracks based on your listening habits
- Explore SoundCloud Charts for the best music or podcasts in each genre
- Connect directly with artists and fellow listeners
- Create playlists for any occasion
- Find new music faster with curated playlists 

Listen to the biggest hits and discover what‚Äôs next in music

SoundCloud is the world's largest music and audio streaming platform with more than 200 million tracks and a global community of 20 million-plus artists from every creative corner of the world. On SoundCloud you can discover music that exists nowhere else ‚Äì DJ sets, hand-curated playlists, remixes and freestyles ‚Äì right next to chart-topping albums and mainstream releases.

Our massive catalog has the biggest hits in pop, hip-hop, rap, electronic, rock, techno, classical, jazz and podcasts, but also the sub-genres and songs within these communities that you‚Äôll be hearing about next year.  

Find and connect with your community

SoundCloud is the only place where artists and fans and curators collide to push music culture forward together. You can connect to emerging artists and today‚Äôs superstars directly and in real time, and hear their new songs within seconds of them being shared. Or follow our curator‚Äôs community profiles (our take on genres), so the trending tracks and playlists our plugged-in music experts are posting will land in your stream.

Support the artists you love

Fuel the success of emerging and established artists. Every like, play, comment, and repost resonates and establishes a creator‚Äôs reputation, provides motivation, and amplifies their reach. Every listen and subscription purchased on SoundCloud puts more money in artist‚Äôs pockets, empowering and enabling them to continue to create and push music culture forward. 

Subscribe to SoundCloud Go+ for premium listening

With SoundCloud Go+, you can get access to every track on SoundCloud, from the biggest hits what‚Äôs next in music. With offline listening, you can take your music with you wherever you go, and with no ads, nothing stands between you and your favorite tracks. You can get even closer to a creator‚Äôs intended sound and vision with high quality audio. 

SOUNDCLOUD GO:

- Save unlimited tracks for offline listening
- Ad-free listening
- Your subscription helps financially support the millions of creators who are starting and growing their careers on SoundCloud
- Try 30 days free, then $5.99/month*

SOUNDCLOUD GO+:

- Save unlimited tracks for offline listening
- Access full catalog, no previews 
- Get ad-free listening
- High quality audio
- Your subscription helps financially support the millions of creators who are starting and growing their careers on SoundCloud
- Try 30 days free, then $9.99/month**

JOIN THE COMMUNITY

SoundCloud Blog: http://blog.soundcloud.com
Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/soundcloud
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/soundcloud
Tumblr: http://soundcloud.tumblr.com
Instagram: http://instagram.com/soundcloud

PROBLEMS? FEEDBACK?

The more you tell us, the better SoundCloud gets.

http://soundcloudcommunity.com
http://help.soundcloud.com
https://twitter.com/SCsupport

SoundCloud is available in English, Brazilian Portuguese, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Swedish.

Privacy Policy: https://soundcloud.com/pages/privacy
Terms of Use: https://soundcloud.com/terms-of-use

comments: I've been using using SoundCloud for 10+ years and have been the jukebox for my family friends and co-workers since then üòá Top music, plays in the background, minimal data usage, best playlists, stations tuned to your taste almost always guaranteed to add at least one choice song to your library a day. I have 1250 liked in the last 10 years. SoundCloud will forever be the best source of music to me. God bless you all in Jesus Christ name and may peace be with you. üôèüòá‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è

soundclouds been good to me when it came to listening to anime openings and such, but recently every time i open the app it just closes down. immediately. if it doesnt immediately, then it does as soon as u play something. id like to listen to music here more but i guess not?? since the app doesnt even work???

It's amazing u can stream a lot of music on here if u have ur favorite followed you get notified when they drop some new songs. But what I love mostly is the fun of discovering new completely unheard of artists. Though I rated it 4star the other star is it doesn't give you control of the songs you drop if you are an artist it doesn't give u control of your profile but overall it's an amazing App

Intolerable lack of functionality. Cannot add or delete your own tracks from the app, can only be done from a pc!!! Now file browsers won't pick up soundcloud in sharing options, this thing is useless. Cannot manage your own music with it on the very device you're likely to part produce it. Can't even use the website on mobile to compensate. Tired of waiting for SoundCloud to listen to its users. Dumped as the annoyance it is. Ludicrous attitude to functionality. Ignorant, obdurate, and a fail.

I've been using SoundCloud for 2 or 3 years now. Overall, it's been pretty good although I've noticed some changes over the years. Slowly there's been more ads added and more "you need the unlimited version to listen to-" when this app was, or what I originally thought, a way to listen to music 'free' Either way, it still works well and is useful. There's plently of artist on there that are up and coming, not to mention lots of covers. I'd recommend seeing that it's still technically free & good

title: Google Play Music
description:
Google Play Music provides free, ad-supported radio for what you‚Äôre doing, how you‚Äôre feeling, or what you want to hear. Instantly start radio stations based on songs, artists, or albums, or browse by genre, mood, activity, decade, and more. Bring your own music collection with you by uploading 50,000 of your own songs; then listen to them across Android, iOS, and the web, for free.

Subscribe to get on-demand access to millions of songs and download anything to listen even when you‚Äôre not connected - or sign up for the family plan on Android to provide access for up to six family members for one low price. comments: I've used this app for years now and never saw a reason to bother with another one. But now I need to switch to another option. I use music on my phone to deal with sensory issues. Unfortunately, Google has decided to start sneaking Tracks It Thinks I Might Like (I think) on my playlists every here and there. At first, I could delete them and found an option to tell it to stop downloading them. But now, it streams them instead, and I can't just get rid of them with the 'delete' button anymore. This is extremely disrupting and, in areas of higher stress/sensory input, downright distressing. I need to switch to another music player because and only because I can't find an "off setting" for its new "add random music you don't own to your Playing Now" habit. If they decide to fix this and I find out that they fixed it, I really wouldn't mind going back to it. But for now, it's a no-go for me.

Has a lot of problems really. It crashes, it always restarts the songs everytime I play them. I can't find most of the artists I listen. I mean Bethel Music is a really popular group but they don't have most of their content. Scrolling problem, not enough distance between the 3 dots and the scroll line. I'm really dissatisfied. Please fix it.

Can you please fix the scroll problem? There is very little space between the scroll bar and the three dots symbol for each song. This is incredibly frustrating when you are trying to add multiple songs to a playlist. If you tap a couple of millimeters to the right, the scroll button gets activated and takes you to a random portion of the song list. I can't believe Google hasn't fixed this yet.

Weird beeping has started to play every time a button is pressed or the song auto plays to the next in a play list SO ANNOYING, can't seem to find a fix for this. It is random, sometimes it's there and other times it doesn't do it. Have sent feedback from the app but that goes no where. I'm going to download all my songs and use the dafault Samsung music app.

Best music player before I began to use a samsung. Even now, play music is yet one of the top music apps; if not among the top 3. However, we can add the search feature to the app, so one could search, stream and download any music. This would perfect play music and increase the rate of downloads. Already, it's been from Google LLC, but adding the feature suggested would make this app top 3. Another feature we can add is the dark mode. Thanks and well done Google LLC. Nick, Nigeria.

comments: This has been a great app for a while. I like it much better than Google Play music. But recently I've been having issues with it. I have continuous play on but it will only play 3-4 songs then close the app. I'm hoping there will be a fix soon or I will have to delete it. Update : It won't add tracks to my playlist! Sometimes the music stops between tracks until I unlock the screen.

My phone was having problems with a number apps, it could slow down and I was forced to uninstall a couple of other music apps, document viewing apps, even shareit as well, but I'm glad this music player is running perfectly fine. It never slowed down my device, neither did it fail to respond like the apps I was forced to uninstall did. The features of this app are really good, a number of options which I can 'manipulate' as per my wish.

This works well so far, it comes complete with bass boost and equalizer (and they actually work). And for once I can edit my song's tags, it this is a amazing and efficient app. It's got customizable everything on it as well even the color! Keep up the good work and I love how if you do decide to buy this app its not over priced either just 2$ thanks again whoever developed this app.... had this app for six months now it still works great organizes my videos and my music awesomly!!!

Excellent. It displays folders with music and can play it. You can rewind a song forward or back, a feature not every music player has, but this player has it. Other players are full of unnecessary features that are annoying, but this one is simpler and easier to use.

This is the best, quickest, user friendly application I've come across in all my years of trying out hundreds. If you like your music then download and give this a go. I love the options, esp to record and drive mode. Good job guys.

title: WavePad Audio Editor Free
description:
WavePad Free sound and audio editing application. Record, edit, and add effects, then send audio to yourself or others to share or continuing editing on another device. WavePad Free allows you to record voice or music, then edit the recording and add sound effects, clean up background noise and more to achieve high quality audio recordings. 

WavePad Free works with audio waveforms to make selections for quick editing, such as inserting sound from other files, or apply sound effects like the high pass filter to clarify audio quality. 

This free sound editor is ideal for anyone who needs to make recordings and edit on the go. WavePad Free makes it easy to store or send recordings so they are readily available wherever they are needed. 

‚Ä¢ Supports a number of file formats including wave and aiff 
‚Ä¢ Editing capabilities include cut, copy, paste, insert, trim and more 
‚Ä¢ Effects include amplify, normalize, echo and more 
‚Ä¢ Edit multiple audio file formats 
‚Ä¢ Supports auto-trim editing and voice activated recording

comments: Amazing! Did exactly what i wanted it to do. I was having trouble trying to edit my audios on many other apps because most other apps require you to buy a membership but this app is different. It allows you to easily edit audios and video and is really easy to navigate.

Hi, used it for the first time just now, and am very impressed at the ease with I was able to edit music, and mixing, video editing, video to audio are all impressive, especially ease of use - for amateurs like me, this is great but I feel Expert Users will also find it very useful particularly the time it saves. Will update as I gain some more experience - thanks team, 5üåü, no doubt.

Excellent Ap thus far. I compose music on a Yamaha Piano, and I am interested in how Super Sound may Augment my works. The Equalizer function is extremely helpful in correcting anomolies present in recording. Sometimes, my recordings sound muffled, as if listening to them from inside a barrel or drum. To fix this undesired atmosphere effects: I reduced the 230 Hz slider; whilst increasing the 910 & 3600 Hz sliders. This adjustment usually clarifies the piano and accompanied stringed instruments.

Not used. I dont know how yet. I want to take a song i recorded using video recorder and make it an audio file to add to my music on my phone. Id love to cut a ring tone from it too. But...so far im lost. But this app has other wonder possibilities for other things im sure. I'll let cha all kmow how it goes down the road. K?

Subject to change, i dl this app only to trim audio files in mp3 format. On a scale of 1-10, it does that excellently. My only suggestion to the creators is to give you option to replace the original or make a copy. Also i dinged the app for asking me to rate it after completing every action I did. Kinda annoying guys.

title: WaveEditor for Android‚Ñ¢ Audio Recorder & Editor
description:
WaveEditor for Android‚Ñ¢ is a professional tool for editing, recording, and mastering audio. WaveEditor also supports a large variety of file types that make it suitable for audio format conversion and media playback.

Features
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMulti-Track mixing and editing
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉWAV or MP3 recording formats
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉVisual tools (FFT, oscilloscope, spectrogram)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSupported import formats: 3gp, aac, aif, aifc, aiff, alac, amr, au, caf, flac, htk, iff, m4a, mat4, mat5, mp3, mp4, ogg, paf, pcm, pvf, raw, sd2, sf, snd, svx, voc, w64, wav, xi
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSupported export formats: aiff, flac, mp3, ogg, pcm, wav
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉStandalone and in-editor audio recorders
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉUSB Microphone support (More info: https://sbaud.io/wavstudio-usb-microphone-support/)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉBuilt-in file browser for loading and saving files
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉ32-bit floating point signal processing
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSingle sample editing
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉZooming, panning, and selection functions
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMacro processes such as fade, reverse, & invert
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉAmplitude meter
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉUndo/redo & copy/paste features
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCompact view setting for smaller devices
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉAlternative waveform colors for better stereo visualization
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉSeparate audio format conversion utility
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉAuto pitch tune effect
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉRecorder widget

Effects
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉChorus(Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCrusher (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉDelay (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉDistortion (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉPhaser (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉReverb (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉFilter
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉGraphic EQ
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉParametric EQ (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉStereo Mixer
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉCompressor (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉMulti-band Compressor (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉGain
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉNoise Gate
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉNormalization
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉInsert Silence
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉResample
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉGranular Stretch
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉPitch Correction (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉPitch Shift (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTime Stretch (Pro)
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉTapestop

Pro Upgrade
The free version of WaveEditor contains many features and is quite useful. However, if you like this app, buy the upgraded version to fully utilize its potential. This can be done within the app via In App Billing, and ensures future support as well as new features in later releases.

Benefits of upgrading are as follows:
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉAll advertisements removed
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉAll effects unlocked

Permission Details
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉRead/Write Storage - Used for importing and exporting audio files from storage. Required to use app.
‚Ä¢‚ÄÉRecord - Used for recording audio from mic. Optional, but required to use recorder.   


License Info
This app uses the following libraries:

LAME (www.mp3dev.org) released under the LGPLv2.1 (www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.1.html)
libsndfile (www.mega-nerd.com/libsndfile/) released under the LGPLv2.1 (www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.1.html)
Secret Rabbit Code (www.mega-nerd.com/SRC/) released under the 2-Clause BSD License (www.opensource.org/licenses/BSD-2-Clause)
libvorbis (www.xiph.org/vorbis/) released under a BSD-style license (www.opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause)
libusb (http://libusb.info/) released under the LGPLv2.1 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.1.html)
libFLAC (https://xiph.org/flac/) released under a BSD-style license (www.opensource.org/licenses/BSD-3-Clause)
mpg123(https://www.mpg123.de/) released under the LGPLv2.1 (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-2.1.html)
jTransforms(https://sites.google.com/site/piotrwendykier/software/jtransforms) released under the 2-Clause BSD License (www.opensource.org/licenses/BSD-2-Clause)

The source code for the libraries used in this app can be found here :  https://sbaud.io/wavstudio-audio-editor-recorder/

Note: Patented formats including amr, 3gpp/3gp, m4a, & aac use system level codecs distributed with your device for audio streaming only. Codecs for these formats are not included in this app.

comments: The best audio editing tool for Android. Great, clean, responsive UI which allows you to quickly get the job done. As well as the superb built-in effects, the real gem of this app for me is the conversion tool. Works with so many different input types and is super useful, again with a perfectly pitched interface which let's you get the job done in a couple of taps. Highly recommended!

It's an excellent app for mastering and mixing my music. The recforge 2 app compliments it well too in my opinion. My 2 problems are though, it always seem to take a whole lot of storage when I'm working on a specific audio depending on how long the audio is. Please try to minimize this large storage required. My next problem is that I prefered the older version of the app. The newer versions seems a little bit more complicated.

Hi, where can I find the documentation for the app? I cannot find the way to perform simple tasks. For example, if I play the sound and pause it, I cannot move the payhead into any new position. I can only stop it which moves the playhead automatically to the beginning. The little red tip of the playhead detaches, and I can move it, but that is not where the sound will play. Thanks. [Edit: got it. First I need to move the top of the playhead detached, and then hit "stop" to move the playhead to the new position. This is really counter-intuitive UX. Some basic documentation is needed to avoid the frustration.]

I use this to cut up songs for a ringtone. It is extremely easy to use and intuitive. The ads are also not intrusive at all. I have not encountered any popups after a few months of using. I am not an advanced user but if you are wanting basic functionality then this is a great choice.

This app looks to be one among the best, but I can't see anyone who wants professional audio using this app. There's no external mic support, like the lav mic for phones I'm using. I love that you can disable noise suppresion here, since not even Shure recording app has it. Noy having the ability to use my external mic is a bigger dealbreaker though. If this feature is added I will do a thorough review and update my review.

comments: I like this developers apps and designs. Nice graphic with the spinning record on the turntable.... however, would like to ask the developer to fix the graphic, as the needle immediately goes to the END of the vinyl record and stays there. At least adjust the needle to display at the BEGINNING of the record in the next update. Otherwise, nice job!
Ok, so, I used to love this app, simply because of the bass booster, but, unfortunately it doesn't seem to work anymore? Please fix it, I miss listening to my music like this! Thanks!
Can't edit label on the spot.Going through file manager and edit is a little time consuming. But overall a very friendly user application
This is a wonderful and exciting music app. It's a great experience listening to music. The sound is very good.
Best Music player. Mega Bass. Clear sound. Can share music while playing. I would give it 5 star, but too much advertisement. I want to purchase for eradicate ads, but no option of purchase.

comments: love the aesthetic and constant updates are a great addition. I do wish I could switch back to old button scheme but I totally understand why the new one is default. Lastly, if you're looking to add features, I don't think you could good wrong with more settings. Personally I'd like to be able to pick random decks/tapes out of my own list as apposed to the total pool they normally random from. Love the app, a must have on every device. Thanks for deving, you guys rule.

I like the novelty look!!. The 1st try worked fine but when I tried to record again, the wheels were turning but the counter stayed at zero. Played back what I recorded and nada. I'm thinking it's something simple but can't figure it out. Ugh!!
I would give this app 5 stars, but you can not send the sound files via text messages, which kinda sucks in my case. I will say though, the layout, design, and sound quality are great
This app is absolutely amazing, you can record, any time, place and records whilst phone is locked. You can also pause and play back, so you don't miss any conversations. 5 Stars.
I. Love. This. App. The graphics are bitchin'. The recording quality is on par with your device. Great for song writing or any creative practice stuff. Quick notes. Dare I say; rad.

comments: I would give 5 but recently it started playing different songs than what it said. I figured it was my phone so I tested it when I later got a new one (for different reasons) and the same thing happens. It says x song but I'm hearing y song. It wouldn't be a problem if it was just when I'm scuffling ALL of my songs but it happens when I'm listening to one of my playlists. Itll play songs that aren't even on the playlist. Please fix this, its very frustrating

A great app for playing your music. The interface is costumizable and many skin options to choose from. You can edit song tags, playlist and add album covers. The colors match the album cover which is a nice visual. The free version has pop up ads and the EQ is not that perfect, but overall is way better than Google Play. Highly recommend.

I find this to be a great music player. I wanted a music player that would recognize folders because of how I sort my music . The previous app I was using developed a bug that would automatically play the last song from my phone when I got in my car weather her I called it up or not. I still really like this music player, but I don't like the adds that interrupt everything. I decided to spend the 6.99 ONE-TIME purchase to remove adds. My subscription went through as .99/monthly. This is the choice that I didn't want. I don't know how to change this. They just forced me into the more expensive plan. NOT COOL!

This is the best media player I've used by far. No gripes whatsoever, keep up the good work! Edit: VERY unfortunate that I have to re-rate this app so low... It seems they started focusing more on full screen, spammy ads than the actual experience of the user. It lags horribly now and will even completely hang up mid-song forcing you to restart your phone before it will play again (that or do a hard restart of the app which is a long process when you have the widget install on your homepage).

This is a fantastic music player . . . when you buy it. The ads are super-intrusive if you don't. Have fun waiting five seconds for the playable ads to disappear every single time you want to switch songs. Docked it a point for that. Still rated it a four though because what is there is great. Making playlists and editing tags are easy to do and you can customize how it looks using either the basic colors the app offers or even using pictures from your phone. It's a good.

title: jetAudio HD Music Player
description:
jetAudio is the highest rated and most downloaded media player on CNET.COM and now you can listen to same high-quality sound on your Android phone using jetAudio.

-- Sound Effects & Visualization plugins --
* Crystalizer
* AM3D Audio Enhancer (http://www.am3d.com)
* Bongiovi DPS (http://www.bongioviacoustics.com)
* Visualizations
(Sound effect and Visualization plugins will be sold separately through in-app purchase.)


It plays almost any type of digital music files you have (.wav, .mp3, .ogg, .flac, .m4a, .mpc, .tta, .wv, .ape, .mod, .spx, .opus, .wma* and more) and, it provides a very high quality sound with various effects and enhancements such as Wide, Reverb, X-Bass.

It comes with 32 equalizer presets that will provide a wide array of listening experience. 
For those who would like to customize their own sound experience, it also allows 10/20 bands graphic equalizer and other advanced playback functions including playback speed control, crossfading, AGC and much more.

It can play music via Wi-Fi from shared folders on local home network. It works with shared folders from Windows, USB drive attached to router or Network drives (NAS).

Free Basic version provides same features with Plus version except advertisements and some features.
To enjoy full features of jetAudio, please purchase Plus version.

-- Features for Plus version only --
* 20-bands graphic equalizer
* Tag Editor (MP3, FLAC, OGG, M4A)
* Display lyrics in tag (Unsynchronized lyrics)
* 3 lock screens
* Pitch shifter
* Precise playback speed control (50% ~ 200%)
* Light Gray/White theme for browser (Plus only)
* Grid mode for Artist/Song/Folder/Genre browser
* Adjust FF/REW interval
* Expanded notification bar (for JB)
* MIDI playback (using jetAudio WaveTable MIDI synthesizer engine)

-- Features for Basic/Plus version --
* Play music via Wi-Fi from shared folders on local home network
* Can choose between 3 List modes or 10 Grid modes for layout style
  (In Basic version, layout style can be chosen in Album browser only)
* 14 app widgets : 4x1 (#2), 4x2 (#3), 4x3 (#3), 4x4 (#3), 3x3, 2x2, 2x3
* Find on YouTube
* Last.fm (requires official Last.fm app)
* X-Wide, Reverb, X-Bass sound effects
* AGC (automatic gain control) to avoid volume fluctuations between tracks
* Speed control from 50% to 200% (pitch adjusted)
* Crossfading, Gap-less playback
* Fade-in/Fade-out 
* Repeat A<->B
* Browser and play music by artits, albums, songs, playlists, genres and folders
* Balance/Volume control
* Sleep timer up to 24 hours
* Flick up to post what you're listening to on Twitter
* Flick down to show Now Playing
* Flick left/right to play next/previous
* Lock screens
* Headset button control (Bluetooth headset)
  - press to pause/resume
  - double/triple press to play next/prev
  - long press to mute or TTS (time, title)
* Bluetooth headphone button control
* Send track information via Bluetooth AVRCP 1.3
* Multi-select function (Delete/Add to playlist)
* Keep screen on, Lock orientation options
* Shake to play next/previous track
* Supporting formats:
  MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, M4A, MPC, TTA, WV, APE, MOD (module formats S3M, IT), SPX, OPUS, AIFF
(WMA may not be supported on some devices. Please check your device specification for WMA support)

(If you want to localize jetAudio for your language, please contact jetaudio@jetappfactory.com for more information)

comments: I purchased the ad free version. Now I cannot add any song to any play list. It happened after I purchased the ad free plugin. Wanted to purchase the HD version but after that also if the play list cannot be added there is no point. And the other thing is the feedback. No feedback at all

This is the best music app you can get for free. It has: a 10 band graphic EQ, preamp. -10db to + 10 db. The preamp comes BEFORE THE EQ and not after like in iTunes, another bass tone control and Varible replay gain. You have the option of using a 32 bit, 192 khz engine which means if you have high definition files you can play them without a sample rate reduction or Truncating the last 8 or 16 bits. - Gapless playback. AND THE 10 BAND EQ IS STILL FREE!

Well done Team Jet! Love this app (and I've bought most of the front runners). Above all, the sound quality is superb, very well balanced. Picks out the finer high-end details in tracks as well as offering plenty of solid low end to pack a punch. With a sublime and highly customisable user interface, this really stacks up to be one of if not the best premium audiophile-grade music player!!

plays .aiff files, that's good. has ads and the close icon is tricky to hit at times, too bad we can't swipe an ad away. edit: forgot to mention the first EQ at the top of the system tray is great. especially in the car's sound system, just be mindful not to blow your speakers out.

Deleting and finding new and much better app. Went downhill... had this player for 10 years, and now can't listen to music, as it shuts off-probably due to ads when locked. Very disappointed. Have to search for new player. Won't waste money buying this, especially if it didn't fix this issue.

title: Lexis Audio Editor
description:
Create new audio recordings or edit audio files with the editor. Save the files in the desired audio format. 
The trial version has all the features of the paid version including options to save in wav, m4a, aac, flac and wma format. Saving in mp3 format is available only in the paid version.
- Recorder and player
- Cut, copy and paste
- Delete, insert silence, trim, fade in, fade out
- Normalizing, noise reduction
- Record into existing file, import file into existing file
- Mixes the current file with another file
- 10 band equalizer
- Compressor
- Change Tempo, Speed, Pitch
- Audioformats: mp3 (-320kb/s), wav (16 Bit PCM), flac, m4a, aac and wma, video import: mp4, 3gp, 3g2
Remark: You need enough free memory on your first sd-card to edit sound files. For 10min 48k stereo sound we recommend at least 500MB free memory.


Please have also a look at our new security camera App Lexis Cam. 

If you think this app is useful, we'd love you to rate our app 5 stars.
Showing us some love on the store helps us to continue to work on the app and make things even better!

Really love this app. But can you please add another feature? Ca√± you guys plz add vocal remover but make it not generic. Make it to take out almost all vocals without suffering too much of the instrumentals. Willing to pay for that feature. Thanks.

Useless app.... Doesn't reduce noise at all... Cannot zoom in... Once you minimise the app and again open it the audio you selected disappears and you have to again open the folder and select the audio... Lots of issue... Unfortunately i cannot give a negative rating...
Excellent work. Very nice app. Easy user interface and good UX. The audio quality is great. Thanks for creating such a useful app.

Its a midblowing app with awesome audio.editing features like mixing and mastering noise reduction anyone who wants to record a good quality audio song without going to studio they can hier this aap,aReally awesome.

title: Audio Recorder and Editor
description:
Advanced Audio Recorder (aka Audio Recorder and Editor) records and edits high quality audio file. It is the only recorder on Android that allows you to rewind while recording. It also allows you to merge, trim, and convert audio files, mix two audio files, boost or reduce recording volume, add echo, adjust pitch and speed.

You can easily change your voice, preview the sound and save it to files. 

Main features:

Recording:
1. record high quality audio file in wave/pcm/wav format, and aac/m4a format.

2. pause and rewind recording for wave/pm/wav format.

Editing:

1. trim audio recordings

2. convert recorded audio file to pcm/wav and aac/m4a formats.

3. add echo to your voice

4. adjust pitch/pace/speed/sample of your recording

5. merge multiple wav/aac recordings to one

6. mix two audio recordings, or mix a recording with a preset background music

7. boost or reduce audio volume

8. share your recording

comments: In general, this is a straightforward and effective application. There is one minor change that could improve it immensely. And that is an obvious, well positioned STOP button. How in the hell do you make this app stop playing? Every time I've been away from this app for 3 or 4 weeks, I come back wondering what in the world I have to do to make a song stop playing. So once again, I push all the buttons and finally figure it out. But that should not be necessary in an app of this quality.

Easy to use. Works as described. But not compatible with, or Not optimized for SmsgGlxy 7" Tab4; Notifications. Require ' .ogg ' ? files? Or Smsng Prohibits overall Any but 'provided defalt sounds' for "Notification" Sounds. GOOD AP, thanx for trial time to use n discover issues. Still, unless heavy 'Sound' use, not worth more than free.

It's a very convenient and easy to use app for the purpose of recording, cutting and basic filter functions. Quality of recordings can also be set to a number of different formats and KHz. Very happy with it.

Do NOT install this. I really suspect it records you outside of the app. It was super buggy while I was using it and when I tried closing out of it, it made my phone run very slow like it was still running in the background. When I went to clear my phone's memory space it said that it wasn't able to clear an app's cache (which I've never seen before.) My phone then forced me to restart my phone in Safe Mode only then was I able to uninstall it. All the positive reviews seem fake too.

Got it for the echo. 4 a phone app it is better than expected on instrumental stuff..5***** for that. Not so for music and lyrics. Music still sounds good with the echo, but can't get echo I want for lyrics. 2 tracks would be awesome so you could record your music, then hook into your phones port w/ a headset and mic, allowing you to record your lyrics as you listen to the music. Keeping them both as separate temp files, then add echo, listen, edit until satisfied.

title: Audio Evolution Mobile Studio TRIAL
description:
The most powerful multitrack audio/MIDI recording studio on Android with support for over 250 USB audio/MIDI interfaces!  Layer tracks to build up an entire song, play virtual instruments, add drum patterns, edit audio and MIDI with unlimited undo/redo, mix, add real-time effects, automate and much more!

Note that this is a TRIAL version of the full paid version and as such has some limitations!

Check out our new tutorial videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2BePLCxWnDI&list=PLD3ojanF28mZ60SQyMI7LlgD3DO_iRqYW

The following optional in-app purchases are available in the full version to enable the following features:
‚Ä¢ USB audio interface support (you can also purchase USB Audio Recorder PRO). Please see our compatibility list here http://www.extreamsd.com/USBAudioRecorderPRO and for more information: http://www.audio-evolution.com/manual/doku.php?id=usbaudiosupport
‚Ä¢ FX pack 1 (distortion, overdrive, speaker sim, wah wah, phaser)
‚Ä¢ FX pack 2 (10-, 15-, 30-band graphic EQ)
‚Ä¢ ToneBoosters pack 1 (Barricade, DeEsser, Gate, Reverb)
‚Ä¢ ToneBoosters EQ with frequency analyzer
‚Ä¢ ToneBoosters Compressor
‚Ä¢ Vocal Tune with two-voice harmonizer
‚Ä¢ Soundfont packs

Features:
‚Ä¢ Multitrack audio recording/playback
‚Ä¢ MIDI sequencing
‚Ä¢ Drum pattern editor
‚Ä¢ Low latency with a USB audio interface (*)
‚Ä¢ Non-linear non-destructive editing with move, trim, split, cut/copy/paste, remove, cross-fade and range editing
‚Ä¢ Virtual instruments based on SoundFonts
‚Ä¢ Loop playback
‚Ä¢ Automation of all mixer and effect parameters
‚Ä¢ Latency correction
‚Ä¢ Import of WAV, MP3, AIFF, FLAC, Ogg/Vorbis audio files  (m4a and others when running Android 4.1 or higher)
‚Ä¢ Mastering (mixdown) to stereo WAV, AIFF, FLAC or OGG file
‚Ä¢ Software monitoring for USB audio devices and some Android devices that have low enough latency
‚Ä¢ Sample rate conversion
‚Ä¢ Metronome
‚Ä¢ Punch in/out
‚Ä¢ Zoom down to the sample
‚Ä¢ Each track has controls for volume, panning, mute, solo, arm, 3-band EQ with mid-sweep, 3 insert effects, 2 effect sends and output bus selection
‚Ä¢ Unlimited number of tracks (*)
‚Ä¢ Unlimited number of groups (*)
‚Ä¢ Real-time effects including: chorus, compressor, delay, dual delay, reverse delay, reverb, flanger, noise gate and many more!
‚Ä¢ Offline effects: fade in/out, normalize, reverse, pitch shift, time stretching while maintaining pitch
‚Ä¢ Unlimited undo/redo for editing facilities
‚Ä¢ Grid options for aligning your samples (with tempo and time signature)
‚Ä¢ Repeat samples with several options to create loops
‚Ä¢ Projects are interchangeable with our iOS version
‚Ä¢ Export to other DAW's by rendering all tracks to separate audio files (stems)
‚Ä¢ In short: a complete portable multi track music studio that will replace your 4 track recorder or tape machine, almost for free!

(*) Depending on your hardware's capabilities

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ 800x480 screen size or higher
‚Ä¢ Android 2.3.3 or higher

If you have any suggestions, questions or want to report a bug, please contact us! Instead of a negative review, please have the decency to contact us so we can actually solve your problem!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/extreamsd
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AudioEvolutionMobile
Forum: http://www.extreamsd.com/forum
Online manual: http://www.audio-evolution.com/manual/doku.php?id=start

To prevent your device's mic from picking up what the speaker is playing back, we recommend using either a USB audio interface or a headset.

title: Music Volume EQ - Equalizer Bass Booster Amplifier
description:
ÔªøBass booster & music volume equalizer for Android

Control your music volume, boost your music and amplify your audio with Music Volume EQ.

Listen to the top songs in your music library with the BEST audio control & bass booster app for Android! Music Volume EQ has various features including live music stereo led VU meter, five band Equalizer, amp, bassboost, 3D virtualizer, slider volume & audio control. To get the best results, pair Music Volume EQ with your best headphones. If you don‚Äôt have a pair of headphones or if you want to use a speaker, you can still enjoy good music with our app. Music Volume EQ is also a great speaker booster and bass booster if you use a Bluetooth speaker to listen to music. 
All of us install Android music player to play top songs in our music library. We hope to listen to good music with high quality sound (maybe even surround sounds like in when you are in surround theaters!). However, even with the most advanced mp3 music player, you will still high quality audio control app to get the best sound, even if you are using the best hifi headphones in the market. That‚Äôs why you need Music Volume EQ, the best audio control, speaker booster, amplifer, and equalizer! You can adjust and amp audio and also enjoy live visual with our 3D Virtualizer. 

Œû Features of Music Volume EQ ‚Äì Sound Booster Equalizer:

‚úî Media audio control
‚úî Five band music equalizer
‚úî Bassbooster effect - speaker booster
‚úî 3D Virtualizer effect
‚úî 9 equalizer presets with Custom Preset
‚úî 2 themes (Classic and Material theme)
‚úî Listen to good music whatever audio player you use
‚úî Stereo led VU meter
‚úî Home screen widget
‚úî Lock media volume
‚úî Loudness enhancer - Volume boost amplifier (Only for Android version 4.4 and higher)
‚úî Great for hifi headphones
‚úî Circular music beat bars
‚úî Video volume booster
‚úî Audible sound spectrum
‚úî Live Wallpaper

Our app is compatible with most Android music players, audio player & video players. That means you can still enjoy good music with your favorite MP3 Music player and audio player to play your top songs from your song library. It just takes a few simple steps to enjoy surround sound just like in surround theater from your phone. 

Œû How to install & use:

1. Put on your best headphones 
2. Turn on your Android music player or MP3 music player to play top songs from your music library. 
3. Open Music Volume EQ and adjust sound level and frequency.
4. To save custom preset press Save Preset on the list and type preset name. To delete preset, long press presets name and delete.
5. Select your preferred theme: Classic or Material
6. You can switch to full-screen visualization and enjoy in a stereo sound booster.
7. To close the application and remove from Status Bar long press app power button.
So, what are you waiting for? Are you ready to immerse yourself in the best quality surround sounds like in Surround Theater? Do you want to enjoy the best hifi quality sounds on your headphones? 
Simply download and use Music Volume EQ now for FREE! 
We hope that you enjoy our sound booster equalizer app! If you do, please take a minute to support our app by leaving a rating and review.
