comments: Press and HOLD the and buttons to get it to rewind or fast-forward through the song at intervals of approx. 10 seconds for each 1 second you HOLD the button down. Lots of useful effects & features in this app. But when I attempt to remove the ads (I'm even willing to pay to pay the $4 fee to upgrade)...I get a "server connection issue" error message. It seems that I'm stuck with the ads...seems that they don't want my money! So, only 4 stars now. Fix this for the full 5 stars! Problem fixed!

I'm an old user of this app. Since 2016! Whenever I change my phone I always remember to download this app. I always wish to have a better version of this app. But recently I'm using a Samsung phone and I'm having some issues like it's automatically disable the bass whenever I change the volume. Now I have to hear the entire song with same volume to continue bass mode on or hear the song with bass by continously turn it (Bass) on whenever I change the volume. So what should I do now? Help me!

Tried lots of music apps. This is one of my favourites . Most other app are a variation of the same thing, this has a different layout, the colour and look can be customized by the user. Variable crossfade, graphic equaliser and a nice big volume control knob which a lot don't have. Displays Album art, track and artist info NO INTRUSIVE ADDS.

Decent app...but a few significant probs for me. When on the playing track screen and I navigate to library, it doesn't start at the artist or album I'm currently listening to; it defaults to the top of whatever is in my library. Also the track being played doesn't interface correctly through bluetooth to my vehicle screen via "Ford Pass App" connectivity.

I have had this app for as long as I can remember, and I'm sorry to say that I may be removing it. The app plays music quieter than the mp3 file is even when the volume is at max and the extra volume control is at max. I had this at a five star rating before I ran into this glitch.

title: Poweramp Music Player (Trial)
description:
Poweramp is a powerful music player for Android.

Poweramp v3 is a major update focused on the new Audio engine, UI, and navigation.

‚Ä¢ new Audio engine:
  ‚Ä¢ support for hi-res output (where supported by the device)
  ‚Ä¢ new DSP, including updated Equalizer/Tone/Stereo expand, and the new Reverb/Tempo effects
  ‚Ä¢ internal 64bit processing
  ‚Ä¢ new configurable per-output Options
  ‚Ä¢ new configurable Resampler, Dither options
  ‚Ä¢ opus, tak, mka, dsd dsf/dff formats support
  ‚Ä¢ gapless smoothing
  ‚Ä¢ 30/50/100 volume levels (Settings/Audio/Advanced Tweaks)

‚Ä¢ new UI:
  ‚Ä¢ visualizations (supporting .milk presets and spectrum)
  ‚Ä¢ new "wave" seekbar, can be also static via Skin options
  ‚Ä¢ Light and Dark skins included, both with Pro Buttons and Static Seekbar options
  ‚Ä¢ new notifications
  ‚Ä¢ new menus, panels, popups, dialogs, etc.
  ‚Ä¢ as previously, 3rd party skins are available (v2 skins are not compatible)

‚Ä¢ new navigation:
  ‚Ä¢ pull down or click album art to go to the current playing list
  ‚Ä¢ as previously, swipe album art for the next/previous track, drag more for category 
change (applies also to the bottom miniplayer)
  ‚Ä¢ use bottom miniplayer to return to the main ui or to change tracks
  ‚Ä¢ swipe left/right from lists for fast return
  ‚Ä¢ pinch-zoom in lists
  ‚Ä¢ long press on item for the selection menu

Key Features:
- plays mp3, mp4/m4a (incl. alac), ogg, wma, flac, wav, ape, wv, tta, mpc, aiff; V3 also plays opus, dsd (dff/dsf), mka, tak, flv (audio)
- 10 band optimized graphical equalizer for all supported formats, presets, custom presets
- separate powerful Bass and Treble adjustment
- stereo eXpansion, mono mixing, balance, tempo control, reverb, system MusicFX (where supported by the device)
- Android Auto
- Google Assistant support
- Chromecast support
- m3u/pls http streams
- unique Direct Volume Control (DVC) for extended dynamic range and really deep bass
- crossfade
- gapless 
- replay gain
- plays songs from folders and from own library
- dynamic queue
- lyrics support, including lyrics search via plugin
- embed and standalone .cue files support
- support for m3u, m3u8, pls, wpl playlists, playlist importing and exporting
- downloads missing album art
- artist images downloading
- custom visual themes, lot of skins available on Play
- widgets with many selectable styles, advanced customizations
- lock screen options
- Milkdrop compatible visualization support (and 3rd party downloadable visualizations)
- headset support, automatic Resume on headset and/or BT connection
- scrobbling
- tag editor
- audio info with detailed audio processing information
- ultra fast library scan
- high level of customization via settings

* Android, Android Auto, Google Assistant, Chromecast are trademarks of Google LLC.

This version is 15 days full featured Trial. See Related Apps for Poweramp Full Version Unlocker or use Buy option in Poweramp settings to buy the Full Version. 

====

Common Questions/Answers for Poweramp:
Q. Does my Poweramp v2 purchase include Poweramp v3?
A. Yes, it does.

Q. How do I disable visualization?
A. It's disabled by default, can be enabled/disabled by first left button right under cover or in Settings / Visualizations. 

Q. Seekbar? Titles on cover? Other UI tweaks?
A. Please use settings / Look and feel / Skin and set built-in skin options as needed.

Q. My songs are missing from folders/library/playlists.
A. Please ensure you have all your folders with music actually checked in Poweramp settings/ Library / Music Folders.

Q. Amplified basses are distorted over Bluetooth.
A. Please review Poweramp settings / Audio / Direct Volume Control (DVC) options.

comments: The best at all amongst all other players that are available on the Google play store in terms of performance, UI, them, visualizer, customizing options, beautiful animations, very elegant,  It feels so much better, But one only thing that I didn't love is that it can't change and song or album info although the option of change tags is available but It doesn't work, it seems working on it self I mean u can see the changes only in powerramp but u can't see that in other apps Which's not good

Please add the A-B repeat option. That's the only thing that this app needs. I cannot explain the how good is this app in words because there are so many of them. The first app on Google Play which I bought. Because this app just suite my usage and option I am looking for and the price is also too reasonable and low.

INCONSISTENT. They're constantly changing the settings (for the worse). Has way TOO MANY options, & most don't work properly. Paid for this years ago, & used to love it. Has gotten progressively worse, & I'm FED UP with having to reconfigure the player every time, to simply play my f%@#!n music. UPDATE 3/7/20: Now that I left a bad review, player mysteriously deleted 1/2 of my 4500 mp3s before I shut my phone off to stop it. Thank God I have them backed up on my computer. F.U. PowerAmp !!!

The OG...been using power amp since the 90's, still great! Bought the app for my first smart phone and have been getting massive amounts of use from it since, feels kinda cheap on my end honestly, I spent $4 like 15 years ago and this is still my favorite music app and it will be yours too once you get used to it, very powerful player with huge amounts of options and deep control. Huge fan of the app and the company, you won't regret use this and like me you'll end up buying it eventually!

Before the forced Android 10 update from AT&T this app worked fine on my Note 9. Now, however, every time I plug my phone into a TV (using a HDMI connection) the player just starts playing automatically at full volume. It is totally annoying. I have the poweramp paid version. Also I have the poweramp widget on my home screen. After you fix this, I will change my review from 3 to 5 stars.

title: Audiosdroid Audio Studio DAW
description:
- Professional and the easiest Digital Audio Workstation (DAW), sound & music recorder, editor and mixer
- Edit & mix MP3,  MP4, WAV, AAC, and AMR audio files
- Create audio files, ringtones, alarms, and notifications in mp3 & wav format
- Add new tracks, mix the tracks and save the mixed audio file in mp3 & wav format
- Record audio with your device microphone and mix the recorded audio file with other audio tracks 
- Share your recorded or mixed audio files with Whatsapp, ChatOn, Email, Bluetooth, Wifi, Google Drive, and Dropbox
- Karaoke with your favorite songs
- Play the song you want to accompany, start recording, and sing!
- Add background audio or music to your voice or any sound
- Audio studio is in your Android phone & tablet.‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã

Audiosdroid Audio Studio is a professional Digital Audio Workstation (DAW) which includes sound & music recorder, editor and mixer. You can edit and mix MP3, MP4, WAV, AAC, OGG and AMR audio files and create audio files, ringtones, alarms, and notifications. Audiosdroid allows you to add new audio tracks, mix the tracks and save in mp3 format. You can record sound and mix the recorded audio file with other audio tracks. Just import your music and then record your voice over it. You can remove vocals using Karaoke effect. You can make time shift on audio files. You can also crop the audio files and apply silence on desired parts. You can sync the tracks using by applying time offset using the time-shift tool or by entering an offset value in milliseconds (ms). You can make Karaoke with your favourite songs. Just play the song you want to accompany by plugging in your headphone and start recording and sing! You can add background sound or music to your voice or any sound. Sync your audio recordings and audio tracks with time shift tool. Audio studio is in your Android tablet and phone!

You can apply audio effects to the audio files and preview the project. You can apply audio effects to tracks offline and save as audio file. Audio effects are equalizer (Bass, Mid, Hi) , filter, tempo, pitch shifting, Karaoke, reverb, reverb room size, reverb damp, flanger, gate, whoosh and echo effects. You can adjust the value of each effect using the control panel. You can adjust pitch and tempo of your music. You can save and load custom FX presets such as: Bass, Hall Reverb, Concert Hall Reverb, Pitch+1, Pitch-1, Pitch+4 and Pitch-4. 

Audiosdroid allows you to share your recorded or mixed audio files with Whatsapp, ChatOn, Email, Bluetooth, Wifi, Google Drive, Dropbox or any other app which can process audio files. 

Privacy Policy:
https://www.audiosdroid.com/terms

Audiosdroid is an app that lets you conveniently record and mix audio files. You can work with any of the following formats: MP3, MP4, WAV, AAC, OGG, and AMR, and save the results of your mixes directly to your Android's memory. 

Unlike what happens in other similar apps, with Audiosdroid, not only can you record audio, you can also find a handful of integrated audio editing tools as well. You can apply different sound filters, adjust the tone or the reverberation, add echo effects, and much more. 

One of the coolest things about Audiosdroid is that it lets you sing karaoke. All you have to do is connect your headphones, put on the song you want to sing, and start recording to create your own song. And of course, once you're done, you can share it quickly via any other app you have installed. 

Audiosdroid is an excellent app for recording audio. With this app, you can record any sound in a matter of seconds.

Please buy PRO version to remove ads. Please restart the app after buying the In App Product. If the buy button appears again, please click it again to activate your license.

Best bet is this thing is garbage and for lazy children and put Strait linux on your phone like fedora or Ubuntu and use a real program like audacity or ardour; not this garbage. *** you have to be special kind of f***** for this to work because not only will you lose tracks but you have to manually align. There is latency when recording.

Completely disappointed I used the free version for months and loved it never had any problems out of all similar apps I found this 2 be the best so I purchased the pro version and it hasn't worked at all since, not 1 time would give free version 5 stars and the best review but as for this pro version I wish I could give it negative 5 stars but it made me give atleast 1. Good for editing the songs for videos of YouTube! Also, It doesn't play the saved music file with the pitch edited on. Add a feature to save a track with edited pitch!
It's cool. A little fine tuning will just be fine. Add more effects as well. Make it simulate a real recording studio.

title: SoundAssistant
description:
The new version is distributed through the Galaxy Store
http://apps.samsung.com/appquery/appDetail.as?appId=com.samsung.android.soundassistant


SoundAssistant
The sound utility available on the galaxy series
Provides various convenience functions related to audio
- Allow you to control the media volume instead of ringtone when pressing the volume keys
- Support individual application volume (You can control the volume of music and games differently)  
- 150 steps of fine volume and support Floating Equalizer(EQ)
- Create and activate personalize sound settings
- Support mono audio and left/right balance
- Touch the app volume icon in the floating dialog to play/pause and long click to enter the app.

The following features are available only if the Samsung Experience version of the smartphone on which Sound Assistant is installed is 8.5 or later.
‚Äª How to check Samsung Experience Version : Run SoundAssistant - Top right menu - About
- Default volume step when pressing volume button can now be changed
- Audio output of an application can now be switched between Bluetooth or speaker via floating volume dialog (how to use : https://youtu.be/Z5mrB4ryKjE)
- EQ settings can now be saved and shared

Features Available from Samsung Experience version 9.0
- Ability to swap left and right sounds on headphones
- Ability to hear ringtone, notification, and alarm sounds only through headphones when headphone is connected.

comments: The last update sucks, now I can't adjust the eq fast and normally from the rotating wheel buttons, i have to press 1 more button to reach there and I'm not complaining just about that, I am complaining about the delay from when I press that button to when the rotating wheels show up WHAT THE HELL ARE YOU DOING SOUNDASSISTANT ARE YOU RECOMPILING YOURSELF EVERY TIME I OPEN YOU
Multi sound still works with only one app

Some apps are so rude. Like Words With Friends. Words With Friends has no option to control the volume of their annoying commercials. This app fixes that! This app is native to the Samsung device and returns sound control to the user. There are dozens of other incredibly useful features included in this app. I suggest giving it a try. PS. Dual App Sound wins everything.... Imagine composing voice-to-text while the music keeps playing... BEST FEATURE EVER.

This app is great! It should come standard with Samsung phones IMO. It gives you the ability to control individual app volumes instead of one volume for everything running on your phone. I use this app to keep my music player uninterrupted while i play games. Also gives you the ability to control alerts through headphones, left and right pan, and much more! Useful app for sure.

Worked fine, till I reset my note 8. I tell it to mute when I turn on my headphones. It either still rings in the phone, and headset, or rings no where, since everything is muted, even when the plantronics bluetooth headset is turned off. Dropping it to one star from 3. Went to a jabra headset, and either in the morning when it is supposed to turn on the ringer it doesn't, or when the headset is turned off, it doesn't switch to use audio, unless I manually turn the ringer on.

title: LibriVox Audio Books
description:
LibriVox Audio Books offers unlimited access to over 24,000 free audio books.  Each LibriVox audio book can be streamed over the internet or downloaded for later use without any charge.  The LibriVox Audio Books app includes listings for new recordings, featuring classic best sellers and out of print treasures.

The LibriVox audio book app makes it easy to find the book you want.  You can see the most popular books, browse by title, author or genre, look at new recordings, or search by keyword.  You can even find books read by a favorite narrator.  This app allows you to stop playback with a sleep timer, and unlimited bookmarks are available for each book.  You can save and listen to as many books as you like.  Access to the LibriVox collection, thousands of old time radio dramas, and many other collections is entirely free.

With full support for bluetooth controls as well as Android Auto and Google Cast, LibriVox Audio Books makes it easy to take your books with you wherever you go.  Lists of favorites, recent books, and downloaded books make it easy to pick back up just where you left off.

Audio books from LibriVox are free thanks to the dedicated work of hundreds of volunteers who record, edit and distribute the books.  New releases are prepared daily, and the entire catalog spans the breadth of world literature, including novels, history, biography, short stories, poetry and more in both fiction and non-fiction.  US users can purchase an additional 75,000 professional audiobooks, including new releases and best sellers.

comments: I use this app to listen to books while I am on the road. It's a good enough app but it has some quirks on my Google Pixel 4XL running Android 10. 1. Once I set up my home page it resets to the default when I reopen the app. 2. I can pause via Bluetooth but I can only get it to play by tapping play the phone. I don't have this problem with any other app. Please fix this so I can rate this app higher.

I love this app!!! The different narrators really spice up my experience! I am someone who can't focus on reading very easily, but listening works well with my brain. Unfortunately I can't afford and audible subscription, so when I found this I was OVER THE MOON!! Now I can finally read as much as my friends and mentors!

Wonderful app with loads of public domain and classic literature. Very easy to use as well. Wish the reader's audio quality was more consistent, as some are clear and others difficult to understand. If not for this, I'd have given 5 stars. However, nearly all these books are being read by volunteers - making a great deal of their audiobooks completely free. Fair trade off all things considered. That being said, if you want new releases with a higher audio consistency I suggest looking elsewhere.

Only thing that I think this app is missing is a better search engine. As far as I have seen, there no way to filter my search at all. I am very grateful that there are so many free books to choose from. I have eyesight problems. If it weren't for Librovox, I wouldn't be able to enjoy one of my favorite pass times. Thank you! Update: I no longer have any complaints whatsoever! The search engine is great! Your customer service is prompt and helpful! Librovox is great!

Really good app and superb customer service. However, lately there seems to be a lot of spam in the new uploads. I check what's new from time to time, but can no longer do that because there are hundreds of uploads by the same person (usually religious teachings). It would be great to either a) limit the number of uploads per week or b) have a filter for the new uploads. Also, it would be great to be able to sort my Favourites list by length of audiobook. That would be absolutely amazing!

title: Music Player - 10 Bands Equalizer MP3 Audio Player
description:
Music Player & Audio Player with Volume boost, extra loud sound speaker, stylish design, light structure, and multi-format supported is a Free Music Player which combines the built-in 10 bands equalizer. Music & Audio Player is a powerful music player for Android with bass boost, reverb effects and the built-in equalizer which can bring great sound effects and the best musical experience to fulfill all your musical needs!

Music Player supports 10 bands audio equalizer to improves music sound, you can customize with own style, change the speed and pitch of your mp3 and audio, , it's a wonderful sound changer for you!

title: Voice Recorder Pro
description:
Voice recorder - Audio recorder
Voice Recorder is free, full-featured, beautifully designed and easy to use audio recording app for android.
Our sound recorder provides high quality recordings without limits of time (only limited by memory size).
You can use it as a regular dictaphone for record voice notes and memos, business meetings, interviews, lectures, speeches, concerts, sleep talking :) or anything else.
This audio recorder works well on smartphones and tablets, with and without external storage.


More features and details
‚Ä¢ 4 Different audio formats: MP3, high quality PCM (wav), good quality AAC (m4a/mp4) and AMR (3gp) to save space
‚Ä¢ Adjustable sample rate from phone quality (8 kHz) up to CD quality (44 kHz)
‚Ä¢ Changeable bitrate from 32 up to 320 kbps
‚Ä¢ Support for stereo and mono recording
‚Ä¢ Live audio spectrum analyzer
‚Ä¢ Recording in background even when screen is off
‚Ä¢ Customizable recordings folder
‚Ä¢ Selectable audio source (microphones or phone call)
    NOTE: This app is not dedicated call recorder and may not work properly on some devices.
‚Ä¢ Built-in user-friendly media player with volume control exactly like in a regular mp3 player
‚Ä¢ Send and share via e-mail and other apps
‚Ä¢ Rename and delete your recordings
‚Ä¢ Set recording as ringtone, alarm or notification sound
‚Ä¢ Open with option allows you to play and edit sounds in other apps
‚Ä¢ Resizable widget displays your recordings and provides quick access to the app
‚Ä¢ Control recorder and player from the status bar
‚Ä¢ Blinking LED notification during recording and playing when screen is off (for devices with notifiation LED)
‚Ä¢ Automatic stop when out of memory
‚Ä¢ Stop recording or playing when active call
‚Ä¢ Auto start recording
‚Ä¢ Share and delete multiple files at the same time (long-click selection support)
‚Ä¢ Sorting recordings by date, name, size and duration
‚Ä¢ Saving sounds to android media library

title: BandLab ‚Äì Music Recording Studio & Social Network
description:
Import a track or create your song from scratch, collaborate with creators and producers, and publish your epic hits for the global BandLab community! Our easy-to-use multi-track editor is a launchpad that lets you record, edit and remix any tune to perfection. Throw in creative effects, beats, loops, and vocals from hundreds of free sound packs available, and be inspired by samples from musical genres like EDM, dubstep, garage, hip-hop, house, rock, rap and more.

With BandLab‚Äôs social networking features, you can find new friends, connect with collaborators and start a band with fellow musicians, guitarists, beat makers, rappers and more ‚Äî no audition needed! Message the pros and pioneers in the community for tips and techniques, and share your favorite collections with an audience that‚Äôs always eager to listen. Go from new to seasoned musician in no time.

BandLab also lets you discover and stream millions of tracks made by emerging and established artists, bands and DJs. Create personalized playlists or tune in to our daily chart-topping curations!

Our app comes with unlimited cloud storage so you can record to your heart's content. What's more, BandLab works seamlessly across all devices ‚Äì crossover to our desktop site to load your projects, feed, bands and communities instantly.

BandLab is absolutely FREE to use. No subscription fees, paywalls or limits to your experience. Get #BandLab and be a music maker today!

‚ñ∫ FEATURES

‚Ä¢ 12-Track Mix Editor ‚Äì Access our multi-track digital audio workstation (DAW) to record live audio or import, mix, splice and tweak tracks for the perfect mixdown. Customize track layers and add lyrics instantly.

‚Ä¢ 100+ Vocal/Guitar/Bass Presets ‚Äì Access world-class effects with real-time monitoring. Use a medley of effects and filters, from drum phaser to gated reverb and more.

‚Ä¢ Looper ‚Äì DJ like a pro with our extensive loop packs. Build an orchestra of sounds, add some synth or reverb, or just freestyle your way to a whole new mixtape while on the go.

‚Ä¢ Creator Kits ‚Äì Produce all-new grooves using preloaded sound packs across multiple genres. Think of it as your favorite virtual drum pad machine (DPM) or music production controller (MPC).

‚Ä¢ 100+ Virtual MIDI Instruments ‚Äì Compose music using anything from acoustic guitars to keyboards, pianos to synthesizers and a variety of drums, all within an app that fits in your pocket.

‚Ä¢ Explore ‚Äì Not in the mood to create? No problem! Let BandLab be a source of entertainment as you explore and get inspired by new artists, genres and collections curated just for you.

‚Ä¢ Creator Connect ‚Äì Team up with like-minded artists just around the corner or halfway across the world! Just fill out your profile and we'll match you to potential collaborators who share your musical taste and inspiration.

‚Ä¢ Mastering ‚Äì Need your mix to sound like it came from the production studio? Upload your song or recording and let our built-in equalizer work its magic. Supports mp3 and other formats.

‚Ä¢ Tuner and Metronome ‚Äì Finding your rhythm is now a cakewalk with these essential audio tools.

‚Ä¢ Remix Tracks ‚Äì ‚ÄúFork‚Äù tracks that other creators have shared with the community and make your own mashups.

See something wrong? Send your feedback to support@bandlab.com.
comments: Amazing. If you're into making music/songs..then bandlab is definitely for you. Even with a headphone mic you can record decent vocals. If you invest in a decent microphone the results are even better. Making beats is fun too. With lots of loops/samples and instruments to play around with. Or you can simply import an instrumental track that is stored on your phone. Takes a bit of getting used to.. But once you get to grips with things and learn how things work it's awesome.

Well, I have not found a way to change the pitch of a track. For example, if i pick a MIDI instrument and lay out some chords that sound better lower, I have to manually transpose them. As for effects, search needs to retreive what the effect does instead of its name. Also, please add an ADSR envelope generator. This would be 5 stars if those are added.

It's great and I am very happy with it. I had to delete it due to issues with my phone and now that I try to log in again, I am logged into an account with all of my projects gone. Either I am logged into the wrong account OR the projects were deleted somehow. The picture of me is not the correct one either, so I am guessing it is the former. How would I recover the correct account? Please help!

... update.. I love the master effects. Uploading my own instrumentals is a big plus. From Mobile to Computer, to Mobile is the best. Great Job. I'm having trouble downloading my file, there are options, but it takes me to share options. That reason is for the 1 star, if I was able to have access to the raw file so I can use it for my video edit, yes. Great. Love how you let me change the pitch and speed of an existing project of mine.

I have a phone that has no headphone jack, and when I try to plug in headphones by USB-c, it won't allow me to turn on audio monitoring. There is no delay or feedback if headphones connected by USB-c. Please help. I use Samsung Galaxy Note 10+. The headphones work fine, but it doesn't allow monitoring for some reason. Sometimes monitoring works with my wireless headphones. Also, in some rare times, it did work, but when I changed the orientation, it permanently turned off the monitoring.

title: Audio Glow Music Visualizer
description:
This music visualizer brings your music to the screen in an explosion of bright colors.

‚Ä¢ Visualizes whatever music or sound is coming from any other app. 
‚Ä¢ Dramatically displays artist name and track name for most popular music players.
‚Ä¢ Extensive color and shape options to tweak
‚Ä¢ Save your settings as themes, and use the included Tasker / Locale plugin to load any of your saved themes in response to almost anything you can imagine. 
‚Ä¢ Glistening particles keep the screen alive with motion even when music isn't playing (can be turned off)
‚Ä¢ Shortcut button to link to your favorite music player, as well as built-in play/pause/last/next controls for whichever music player app is running.

NOTE FOR GALAXY OWNERS: If it doesn't react to music, see the free app, Tunnel Blocker.

NOTE FOR NEXUS OWNERS: On some devices, mostly Nexus brand, audio from OpenSL-based players won't visualize. These include but are not limited to: Poweramp, jetAudio, WinAmp, PlayerPro with DSP pack installed, Rocket Player Premium, GoneMad, and Neutron. If you run into this problem, I apologize! Please email me and I will refund you.

Audio from any app will be displayed, but only the following are known to also show meta data. Additionally, more may work if they have an option to turn on scrobbling. Email me if you'd like to see meta data from an app that isn't supported yet. Unforunately, this is not yet possible with iHeartRadio or DoubleTwist. See cyphercove.com for a list of apps currently known to share meta data with Audio Glow.

title: Bass Booster & Equalizer
description:
Improve the sound quality of your android device with the Bass Boost, Virtualizer and Equalizer. Make your music and video sound like never before.
Bass Booster lets you adjust sound effect levels so that you get the best out of your Music, Audio or Video coming out of your device.

Main Features:
* Bass Boost effect
* Stereo surround sound effect
* Five bands Equalizer
* 10 preset equalizations(Normal, Classic, Dance, Flat, Folk, Heavy Metal, Hip Hop, Jazz, Pop, Rock)
* Customizable preset
* 16 Colorful Themes
* Notification control
* Cool Spectrum
* 3 Widgets(1x1, 1x1, 2x2)

Works with most Music and Video players. Simple Installation and usage:
1. Effect for Music or Audio
* Turn on the Music player and play your music
* Turn on the Bass Booster application and adjust sound level and frequency.
* Put headphones for a better result
* To close the application and remove from Status Bar press the close button of notification.

2. Effect for video
* Just like effect for Music or Audio, adjust the sound level and frequency, then, let it run in the background.
* Turn on the Video player and play your video
* You will get a better sound effect for video

recentChanges: * Fixed bugs
comments: Awesome application, especially the fact that you can get rid of ads by watching 5 videos!! Bro this is what we all need, developers who give you the option to have or not have ads, makes me want to keep the ads knowing I can get rid of them, I dont know, something about having options instead of being restricted makes everything well, besides that, the app itself is amazing, using it is a piece of cake, you can become a DJ with this if used the correct way!

Dear Coocent, You have done a great job by making the only reliable and effective app for enhancing our experience. But as more and more devices are upgrading to Android 10, it tends to WORSEN the sound quality and bass! It no more works on ANDROID 10. It is a Serious Problem so please fix this As Soon As Possible! Please! I will be waiting for your reply!

I thoroughly rely on this app whenever I have music playing ... Which is just about constantly Simple layout to make adjustments quick on the fly, Just enough UI tweaks to make it unique to my style and plenty of appropriately tuned presets to cover every scenario. Most notable quality for me above all else has been it's flawless service... Not a single error or crash to date for me so I gladly rate 5/5.

By far, after a lot of test and trails, i can assure that this is the best app out of all the othe equalizer apps. This bass is boosted in a smooth way and doent distort the sound like the other apps. The best setting i would suggest is to set the EQ to Hiphop and turn up the bass upto 90+ . I use it with Sony bluetooth headphones, skull candy hesh and real me buds.

Needs more powerful audio booster. And a 10-band equalizer. My systems boombox is better Yet both of them together. Sounds fine. I would not be able to use this without my systems built in one. And my separate volume booster. So yes, this needs work. But it's okay. And you should make it adjustable for other apps to play. Inside

title: Audio Evolution Mobile Studio
description:
From recording song ideas to full-fledged mobile productions, Audio Evolution Mobile sets the standard for music creation on Android. Whether you are recording using the internal mic or recording from a multi-channel USB audio (*) or MIDI interface, Audio Evolution Mobile rivals desktop DAWs. Featuring editing with unlimited undo/redo, virtual instruments, real-time effects, mixer automation, audio loops, drum pattern editing and so on, the app will give you endless creativity options.

Don't know where to start? Check out our new tutorial video series: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2BePLCxWnDI&list=PLD3ojanF28mZ60SQyMI7LlgD3DO_iRqYW

And if you still have questions or problems, there is always somebody to help you out on our forums or get lightning fast replies from our email tech support!

Now for the boring list of features:
‚Ä¢ Multitrack audio recording / playback
‚Ä¢ MIDI sequencing
‚Ä¢ Drum pattern editor
‚Ä¢ Low latency and multichannel recording/playback using a USB audio interface (*)
‚Ä¢ Non-linear non-destructive editing with move, trim, split, cut/copy/paste, remove, cross-fade and range editing
‚Ä¢ Virtual instruments based on SoundFonts
‚Ä¢ Loop playback
‚Ä¢ Automation of all mixer and effect parameters
‚Ä¢ Latency correction for track synchronisation
‚Ä¢ Import of WAV, MP3, AIFF, FLAC, Ogg/Vorbis audio files (m4a and others when running Android 4.1 or higher)
‚Ä¢ Mastering (mixdown) to stereo WAV, MP3, AIFF, FLAC or OGG file
‚Ä¢ Software monitoring for USB audio devices and some Android devices that have low enough latency
‚Ä¢ Sample rate conversion
‚Ä¢ Metronome
‚Ä¢ Punch in/out
‚Ä¢ Each track has controls for volume, panning, mute, solo, arm, 3-band EQ with mid-sweep, 3 insert effects, 2 effect sends and output bus selection
‚Ä¢ Unlimited number of tracks
‚Ä¢ Unlimited number of groups
‚Ä¢ Real-time effects including: chorus, compressor, delay, dual delay, reverse delay, reverb, flanger, noise gate and many more!
‚Ä¢ Offline effects: fade in/out, normalize, reverse, pitch shift, time stretching
‚Ä¢ Unlimited undo/redo for editing facilities
‚Ä¢ Several grid options for aligning your samples (with tempo and time signature settings)
‚Ä¢ Repeat samples with several options to create loops
‚Ä¢ MIDI remote control
‚Ä¢ Projects are interchangeable with our iOS version
‚Ä¢ Export to other DAW's by rendering all tracks to separate audio files (stems)
‚Ä¢ Cloud sync to Google Drive (backup or share/exchange projects with one of your other devices on Android or iOS or collaborate with friends)
‚Ä¢ In short: a complete portable multitrack digital audio workstation (DAW) that will replace your 4 track recorder or tape machine, almost for free!

(*) The following in-app purchases are available to expand your studio:
‚Ä¢ USB audio interface support (you can also purchase USB Audio Recorder PRO). Please see our compatibility list here https://www.extreamsd.com/USBAudioRecorderPRO and for more information here: http://www.audio-evolution.com/manual/doku.php?id=usbaudiosupport
‚Ä¢ FX pack 1 (distortion, overdrive, speaker sim, wah wah, phaser)
‚Ä¢ FX pack 2 (10-, 15-, 30-band graphic EQ)
‚Ä¢ ToneBoosters pack 1 (Barricade, DeEsser, Gate, Reverb)
‚Ä¢ ToneBoosters EQ with frequency analyzer
‚Ä¢ ToneBoosters Compressor
‚Ä¢ ToneBoosters Ferox
‚Ä¢ Vocal Tune with two-voice harmonizer
‚Ä¢ Loop/sample packs
‚Ä¢ Soundfont packs

Twitter: https://twitter.com/extreamsd
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AudioEvolutionMobile
Forum: https://www.extreamsd.com/forum
Online manual: http://www.audio-evolution.com/manual/doku.php?id=start

recentChanges: Bug fix and x86_64 build
comments: Running AEM on a Samsung J7 with a Roland Go Mixer and their USB Driver. Have issues with USB Audio after reloading a project - chatter, speed-up, (changing bus speed and rebooting usually clears thisb), and track bleed. Getting better at editing but the cell interface is tedious. Not their fault, just physically small, no mouse. Manual is ...not comprehensive. I'm glad I got it, but spent more time messing with it or emailing Davy than playing. In all fairness, a great DAW, I'm inexperienced.

bought this app to live record a multitrack show of my band on a Fire 10 HD android tablet with a Behringer XR18(compatible). It allows the assignment of 16 mono inputs sequentially to each individual track but does not allow the assigning of mono outputs to the XR18 for multitrack playback for a virtual soundcheck. It only allows stereo 1-2, 3-4 etc for playback... assigning the channels to groups L-R pan unsuccessful as each stereo output can only be assigned to one group at a time. Too bad.

Im recording with just a pair of headphones. I press record. It records for 1 minute and then stops recording my voice. The recording line literally just goes flat. Is this common and what can I do to fix it? (Galaxy S9).

I generally prefer not using my phone for any music projects but when I do I've found this app to be the most flexible, most user friendly and most enjoyable of the many many I've tried. Very reasonably priced to boot.

Hey guys, this app is solid. But I'm having some issues enough saving songs. I've saved multiple times, throwing in some "save as" as well, but it doesn't actually save. I've lost dozens of tracks. Just want to let you know, cause my experience otherwise is pretty dope. Thanks.

title: Audio Recorder (no ads)
description:
Audio recorder (Voice recorder, Sound recorder) - is an open source application makes an easy audio recording experience. 
App optimized for the fastest start as possible and helps not to miss important sound for the user.

There are available two recording formats:
M4A
Waveform Audio File Format (WAVE, or WAV) audio file format standard for storing an audio bitstream on PCs. Stores audio data uncompressed.

In settings, select sample rate, bitrate (for M4A only) and stereo or mono.
Selected preferences directly affect on record file size.

With colorful themes, customize app looking, and make the experience better for you.

Features:
 - Recording audio
 - Playback records
 - Supported recording formats M4A and WAV
 - Set sample rate and bitrate
 - Record and Playback in background
 - Display record waveform
 - Rename record
 - Share record
 - Import audio files
 - Records list
 - Add the selected record to bookmarks
 - Colored themes

https://github.com/Dimowner/AudioRecorder

comments: Excellent. Clever, thorough, very well thought out. The options in settings are all meaningful - in particular the ability to choose a high sampling rate is useful for further processing. That it's free is a gift. Well done, Dmitriy Ponomarenko!

The app is really good, it's almost essential for every stock android users. The Foss license is sweet as cake. Only complaint is with drop down menu, the menu drop is indistinguishable from rest of the settings menu.

Blue and blue gray theme are apparently the same? Also, unable to use my earphone's built in microphone - no option to switch from phone's mic to earphone's mic! Regardless, a very clean and easy to use app

Thank you so much for making this ad free. It's a solid audio recorder with high quality recording options. If you're taking any suggestions, I'd like to see an option to switch to SD storage in the future.
Fantastic app. Happy there are no ads popping up in the interface. Beautiful choice, to record as default M4a. Joy to use and such a simple and easy ui. Many thanks.

title: Pulsar Music Player - Mp3 Player, Audio Player
description:
Pulsar Music Player has long been one of the best music players on Android. It is an offline audio player without advertisements. Its gorgeous user interface matches every single detail of the material design guidelines.

Pulsar contains almost every necessary feature to fulfill all of your musical needs including: gapless playback, lyrics display, crossfade, play speed adjustment, tag editing, last.fm scrobbling, Chromecast, voice command, Android Auto, equalizer, music visualizer, audio balance, ReplayGain, sleep timer, etc.

Pulsar is the ultimate audio player on Android, with millions of downloads. It has been translated into 36 different languages.

Key Features:

‚úì Gorgeous user interface and animation with material design.
‚úì Manage and play music by album, artist, folder, and genre.
‚úì Smart playlists with most played, recently played, and newly added tracks.
‚úì Automatic sync missing album/artist images.
‚úì Fast search across albums, artists, and songs.
‚úì Resizable home screen widget.
‚úì Gapless playback support.
‚úì Play speed adjustment.
‚úì Crossfade support.
‚úì Replay gain volume normalization.
‚úì Built-in metadata tag editor (mp3 and more).
‚úì Display lyrics (embedded and lrc file).
‚úì Sava/restore playback position (useful for podcast and audiobook).
‚úì Music visualizer rendering.
‚úì Chromecast (Google Cast) support.
‚úì Google voice commands support.
‚úì Android Auto support.
‚úì Disable car auto play on Bluetooth.
‚úì Sound balance adjustment.
‚úì Last.fm scrobbling.
‚úì Various colorful themes.
‚úì Free of advertisements.
‚úì Sleep timer.

Pulsar supports standard music file types including mp3, aac, flac, ogg, wav and etc.
If you cannot find your music in Pulsar, please click the ‚Äúrescan library‚Äù menu item from the action bar to rescan your device.

Pulsar audio player has a complete online user manual, click here:
https://rhmsoft.com/pulsar/help/help.html

If you can help to translate this mp3 player to your native language, or there is any mistake in current translation, please contact our email: support@rhmsoft.com.

If you run into any issues or have any suggestions while using this mp3 player, please feel free to contact us: support@rhmsoft.com.
You can also share your comments to the Pulsar audio player thread on xda-developers: 
http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-pulsar-music-player-t3197336

Thanks for using Pulsar Music Player!

Album and artist images used in the screenshots are licensed under Public Domain License:
https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

Pulsar is the ultimate audio player on Android, with millions of downloads. It has been translated into 36 different languages.

Key Features:

‚úì Gorgeous user interface and animation with material design.
‚úì Manage and play music by album, artist, folder, and genre.
‚úì Smart playlists with most played, recently played, and newly added tracks.
‚úì Automatic sync missing album/artist images.
‚úì Fast search across albums, artists, and songs.
‚úì Resizable home screen widget.
‚úì Gapless playback support.
‚úì Play speed adjustment.
‚úì Crossfade support.
‚úì Replay gain volume normalization.
‚úì Built-in metadata tag editor (mp3 and more).
‚úì Display lyrics (embedded and lrc file).
‚úì Sava/restore playback position (useful for podcast and audiobook).
‚úì Music visualizer rendering.
‚úì Chromecast (Google Cast) support.
‚úì Google voice commands support.
‚úì Android Auto support.
‚úì Disable car auto play on Bluetooth.
‚úì Sound balance adjustment.
‚úì Last.fm scrobbling.
‚úì Various colorful themes.
‚úì Free of advertisements.
‚úì Sleep timer.

Pulsar supports standard music file types including mp3, aac, flac, ogg, wav and etc.
If you cannot find your music in Pulsar, please click the ‚Äúrescan library‚Äù menu item from the action bar to rescan your device.

Pulsar audio player has a complete online user manual, click here:
https://rhmsoft.com/pulsar/help/help.html

If you can help to translate this mp3 player to your native language, or there is any mistake in current translation, please contact our email: support@rhmsoft.com.

If you run into any issues or have any suggestions while using this mp3 player, please feel free to contact us: support@rhmsoft.com.
You can also share your comments to the Pulsar audio player thread on xda-developers:
http://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-pulsar-music-player-t3197336

Thanks for using Pulsar Music Player!

Album and artist images used in the screenshots are licensed under Public Domain License:
https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/

Tianxiu Garden, Tianxiu Rd,
Haidian, Beijing, P.R. China

‚úì Fast forward/backward in slide up playback panel.

comments: This is easily the best music player app I've found so far. It looks slick, the UI is exactly what I wanted, the lyric display works perfectly without being difficult to get working, the tag editor is simple and useful and the covers appear in beautiful high res. I can't recommend this app enough, if you're like me and you're tired of the garbage music player on your phone this is your best bet. I rarely say this but I'm honestly considering buying the paid version as well.

Since I've downloaded it, it's been great. Only thing is it'll sometimes separate songs from the same album, making a duplicate of an album that was just created despite info (artist, title, etc) all being the exact same, meaning there's no reason for it to create a duplicate album. Very irritating new bug (as of 2/24/20) that also abruptly and randomly stops the music and restarts it from the beginning when I open the app.

I cannot create or update playlists externally (iTunes) and then reload them onto my phone. I think that the latest Pulsar update (January 9, 2020) may have replaced the use of "relative location" of files on a playlist with "absolute location." Now, every time that I reload an updated playlist (m3u file), Pulsar shows 0 songs in that playlist. Mirroring my folder hierarchy on my phone is not an option because I have the same song on multiple playlists (but in only one folder). When will this be fixed?

Good App.. EXCEPT.. It's great when I'm actually on the app page, I can access the controls, but if I leave something playing, to do something else, then the music continues, but then there is no indication of the controls, no bar with the play /stop button, nothing in the notification bar. If I need to stop it quickly (phone call etc) I have to go back to the main page and look for the app icon to re-open it, to stop the music playing That cant be right. I'm using a Samsung Galaxy Note 10+.

Almost perfect. It's stylish, featureful, and the ability to blacklist certian folders was a "must have" for me. However, I have one gripe that I would love to see remidied. When looking at the track list, you can't see the album art. Just a play button. This really slows down the experience. When someone is about to select a song, their finger covers to song title, so being able to see the album art, to ensure they select the right song is really convient.

title: DS audio
description:
**You must own a Synology NAS to run this app, and be running the latest Audio Station 6.0.0 package to get the complete set of features**

DS audio allows you to stream music stored on your DiskStation with your Android device wherever an Internet connection is available. Better yet, with the offline mode you can listen to songs stored in the device‚Äôs local memory for when no network connection is available. You can browse music by albums, artists, folders or genres, create your own playlists or share them with your friends, and even rate your music! And if you have dedicated stereo speakers at home, DS audio can also become a remote control to stream music to them.

Find all detailed features about the app on our website:
www.synology.com > DSM 6.0 > Mobile Apps > Software Specs
https://www.synology.com/dsm/software_spec/mobile#DSaudio

recentChanges:
- Supports user interface in Thai language.
- Added a previous track button to the playback controls on lock screen.
- Fixed an issue where FLAC files might be downloaded as MP3 files.
- Fixed an issue where the lock screen playback controls might not work properly under certain notification settings.
- Minor bug fixes.
comments: *EDIT* I've been using my DS218+ for over a month now, and DS audio streams my music very easily through this app. The playlist feature is really nice, too. The only thing that's annoying is the app defaults to downloading songs you play, and the disable feature doesn't work. So when you select a song to play, it's automatically downloaded. When you try to disable automatic downloading, it doesn't work. Synology, you have a great device with sub-par apps...fix this.

Mea Culpa, Synology audio app. I became frustrated with the Plex UI and decided to try DS audio again after my previous negative review. Either there have been big improvements with the app or maybe my wireless is more stable. I think the former. The app is much more stable now and very straightforward. I don't need a lot of bells and whistles I just want to select the song from my library and play it. DS Audio does that. Recommended.

Imma give it 3 stars. Here's why: 1. A star off for adding all songs into the queue when you tap on a single song in the folder. You shouldn't need to use the 3-dot menu at the RHS of the track to select play. The default should be to instantly play the song you tap. Any fannying about with adding the entire folder or adding the track to the queue should be done through the menu. 2. Another star off for the widget becoming inoperable if you have exited the app. For instance, restart your phone and then tap on the widget, nada, nothing. You need to go and open the app first, log back in and then the widget is operable. If the app isn't running in the background then the widget should open up the app to allow sign-in. Being able to stream (and download if required) my entire music collection from anywhere I have a data connection is sweet AF tho'.

Basic app, some easy wins would make it vastly better. Others have said it already: slow log in, poor functionality with Android Auto: it's not safe to browse while driving obviously, but even the "recently played" list doesn't update, and when you click on a song, it plays something else. Synology, you can do better!

Synology software is generally great but this I'm giving only 2* for now to hopefully incentivise some work. a) I cannot see any way to prevent downloading or accessing libbary when not on WiFi - that is a massive bug/fault which could prove extremely costly and needs to be fixed pronto b) It was extremely difficuly to force downloads to go to SD card. Eventailly I figured out I had to actually *create* a folder from within the app rather than using an existing one.

description:

App supports music formats: MP3, MP4, WAV, M4A, FLAC, 3GP, OGG, etc

App was organized to help listen to music easier, "Music player" scans all music in your mobile rapidly.
Best audio equalizer improves your sound on speaker in any space

recentChanges: - show encoding speed
comments: I really like the simple and functional nature of this app, however I am having a pretty serious audio sync issue. I use this app to record my voice with a lav mic while I am taking to my camera and then I synchronize the audio/video in post. Unfortunately 1 out of my 4 audio tracks are unsyncable. I will sync the start of the video and it appears to be in sync for 30 seconds or so, but as the video plays the audio progressively loses sync. I have tried stretching the audio track and that helped a little, but the middle of the track is still not synced. I was recording with two mics/devices and fortunately the track that I recorded with the other mic was easy to sync, so that is also how I isolated the issue to my phone/ this app. Overall a good app for voice recording but USE WITH CAUTION IF YOU ARE PLANNING TO SYNC RECORDED AUDIO WITH VIDEO.

Great! Does exactly what it's supposed to without any annoyances or ads. It supports state-of-art codecs like Opus and FLAC. I appreciate that it can skip over silence, encode on the fly, gives visual feedback during recording and can do longtime recordings. The interface is neat and clean. An exit button wouldbe nice because if you enable the lockscreen interface, the app be quit forcefully only. I'd pay or donate (Transferwise, LiberaPay, PayPal) for this in a heartbeat. Thank you very much!

Proximity sensor stops sound from playing when using playback, but the track keeps playing. Ideally I would like the option to disable proximity sensor for this app as it causes me many issues. Other than that it is totally 5 stars.

I don't need to record during phone calls, but while testing, I noticed an oddity. The setting "Pause During Calls" is selected by default. App does not ask for any permission when user deselect it, but select it again and then it does ask for permission (phone calls permission). Great for taking voice notes...
Love the app, does what I want it to do. However the GB storage goes down even when I delete my files after use - clearing the cache doesn't work. Soon I'll have no storage left - any tips?

title: Aspect - Audio Files Spectrogram Analyzer
description:
Aspect helps you to analyze your local audio files by building their spectrogram.

Spectrogram will show the differences in the frequency range when lossless encoding an audio signal and when lossy encoding.
For MP3 and OGG files, it is also easy to see the effect of the coding bit rate on the presence of high frequencies in the audio signal.

Features:

- Allows you to select the decoding method of the audio signal - through the codecs supplied with the device or through the codecs of the BASS project (see the page ‚ÄúAbout‚Äù).
- Supports audio file formats:
    3GP, FLAC, M4A (aac), MP3, MP4, OGG, OPUS, WAV
 and in the case of choosing BASS additionally:
   AIFF, APE, DSF, M4A (alac), MPC, WV
- Allows you to select the color palette of the spectrogram.
- Shows the audio signal parameters.
- Shows the characteristics of the codec used to decode the audio signal.
- Allows you to select an audio channel.
- Builds a spectrogram in both standard and full-screen mode (without axes and action bar), both in portrait and landscape orientation of the screen.
- Allows you to listen to the Spectrogram or its selected part in Zoom Mode.
- In the Zoom Mode, you can select and examine a part of the spectrogram in more detail and repeat this process as long as the duration of the selected section is more than 1 second.
- Automatically adjusts time and frequency scales.
- No Ads.

title: AndroSound Audio Editor
description:
AndroSound provides a handy user interface for easy audio editing on your phone.

You can easily trim your audio files, add effects and produce ringtones.

AndroSound provides you an organized view of all your audio files. You can also record sound and make it ringtone.


Provided functionalities:
 * Trim audio files ( You can also delete middle parts)
 * Fade in/out effect
 * Join trimmed parts and add crossfade effect (Audio Looping)
 * Extract audio from video files
 * Adjust audio volume
 * Edit audio IDtags 
 * Add Echo
 * Change tempo of the audio (Slow down / Speed up)
 * Export your file in MP3, AAC,  FLAC and WAV formats
 * Produce song clips, ringtones, notification and alarm tones
 * Sort audio files by title/artist/size/duration/date
 * Search among audio files
 * Start new recording, trim and produce your own tones
 * Share your audio files
 * Assign ringtone to your contacts (This feature requires Contacts Permission)

If you see any problem please send an email to androsound@androvid.com

title: Samsung Music
description:
Samsung Music is optimized for Samsung android device and provides a powerful music play functionality and the best user interface.

Key Features

1. Supports playback of various sound formats such as MP3, WMA, AAC, FLAC.
2. Helps to effectively manage song lists by categories.(Track,Album,Artist,Genre,Folder,Composer)
3. Supports a new user experience that easily interact with Samsung smart devices like Tablet,TV(DLNA,Screen mirroring),Wearable.
4. Provides a clean and intuitive user interface.
5. The Samsung music shows recommendation of playlists from Spotify. You can find Spotify recommendation music by Spotify tab and search Spotify music you‚Äôll love.
(The Spotify tab is only available in countries where Spotify is on service.)

What is FLAC?
FLAC is an audio coding format similar to MP3 & AAC, but lossless, meaning that audio is compressed in FLAC without any loss in quality.


*** Required App Permissions ***
Below mandatory permission is required for basic features of Samsung Music.
Even if optional permission are denied, basic features may work properly.

[Mandatory Permission]
1. STORAGE permission :
   - Allows the player to write,modify,delete to SD card.
   - Allows the player to read data from SD card.

[Optional Permission]
2. MICROPHONE permission : Galaxy S4, Note3, Note4 only
   - Allows to control the player with voice commands which are listening, not recording.
     ex : PLAY,PAUSE,NEXT,PREVIOUS,VOLUME UP,VOLUME DOWN

3. PHONE permission : Korean devices only.
   - Verify your phone when using the music service.

recentChanges:
[16.2.21.6]
Fixed list

comments: The app is good but there is a huge problem, recently added songs to my device is not recognized by the app, hence is super annoying and no matter what matter I do, the problem is not corrected. This problem occurred in the recent update, never had this issue before, would give a 4 or 5 stars if not for this problem. The recently added songs are on my device(SAMSUNG A30) but is not recognized by the app itself, PLEASE FIX.

What is it that I have to do to be able to click on the first song in an album, and then have it play the whole album in the right order? What is the arrows circling with an A in the center icon for? It only shuffles the currently playing album, whether I have shuffle on or not. This app didn't used to do that, so what happened? You consider "Next song is not played in some models" (in [16.2.21.6] fixes) to be an improvement? It seems like all kinds of weird random stuff is not working properly with this app, going off the other reviews. What happened to the quality we used to get with Samsung?

Not good, the music suddenly just stops. I had a Samsung galaxy S5 and the music would play for a while then just stop, so I had to press the play button again, it happened very often, I assumed it was because I had an older model, I've just upgraded to a Samsung Galaxy S10, I've downloaded this app and it does the same thing again, plays for 5 mins and then just stops, please tell me why Samsung?

Up until yesterday, I've loved the seamless way Samsung Music manages music, especially playlists . However, after the most recent Android system upgrade, my playlists have been stripped of all their tracks.  The songs are still there, visible on my SD card,  but the most important part of the equation (the playlists) have disappeared. When will this problem be fixed? I'd be happy to give this app 5 stars once it resolves this issue

Good app, nice UI interface for on-phone music but inflexible when it comes to selecting which music to include in your collection. It will select all music file types on your phone (including call recordings, ringtones, etc) and include them in your library with no capability of excluding tracks/folders. it's all or nothing. It's a shame since otherwise this is a very good interface for playing music. It will also link to Spotify (but you can't log into it) but no other streaming services.

Our sound recorder provides high quality recordings without limits of time (only limited by memory size).

This audio recorder works well on smartphones and tablets, with and without external storage.

title: Lesser AudioSwitch
description:
Force your audio output to switch to headphones, speakers, or any other output, including USB and Bluetooth devices.

The microphone can also be switched, and on most devices the speaker can be completely muted if you so desire.

Additional features:
Auto-Switch: Detect when headphones are inserted or removed, and switch to any audio output or mute/unmute the speaker automatically.
Restore-on-Boot: Automatically switch to the output of your choice when your device starts.
Widgets: Control the app from your home screen.

Common use cases:
This app can help if your device does not detect your headphones, or it thinks they are connected even when they have been removed.
It can also be used to mute the speaker when using headphones, so that loud notifications do not play via the speaker. 
Want to use a headset microphone but still output audio via the speakers? also possible.
You can force audio to play locally on your device when using Android's native cast-screen feature. 

Advanced users can trigger a switch externally using the following intent actions:
com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch.HEADPHONES
com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch.SPEAKER
com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch.BLUETOOTH
com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch.USB
com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch.CAST
com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch.MUTE
com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch.UNMUTE

com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch.NOTIFICATION_ON
com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch.NOTIFICATION_OFF

On Oreo 8.0 and later you must also specify the target package when using intents: com.nordskog.LesserAudioSwitch

comments: Awesome! thanks. my phone started to think that headphones are unplugged. Now everything is fixed. (05.03.20)Edit: widgets are now a premium feature, now you need to go inside the app itself to switch. It's kinda strange and scummy in a way to downgrade apps and lock previously available features behind paywall. But it's still works flawlessly so... IDK, just disappointed a bit.

WHAT A LIFESAVER. My headphones' mic suck so bad so all I wanted was to record using my phone's mic while listening through headphones. It was deemed impossible until I saw a comment in Quora suggesting this app. And it's a success! "Switch microphone" and choosing internal mic for both speakers and headphones did the trick. Thank you so much AudioSwitch!!! 5 stars for you!

I bought a new phone that had a headphone jack issue (kept thinking headphones were in when they were not) & I couldn't exchange the phone in time so I was stuck with this issue. 5 minutes into videos it would think I'd have headphones in. Or during call I wouldn't be able to hear because of the headphone mode. This app have saved the day. It was worth the $5 to upgrade the app for the auto toggle. A lot of people are griping but I'm happy to pay for the features I need vs cost of a NEW phone.

Not a review but a request for assistance. I have a Rode SC4 adapter which is designed for IPhone, directing audio directly from a mixer to the phone. I purchased this app to trick my android phone into allowing me to stream audio through the phone via the mixer. How can I set this up?

This app is a livesaver. Once I got my headphones jack on my phone, I was on panic. I didn't know what to do, I searched through the internet to fix the problem but all of them didn't work. But I found a YouTube video that I need to download an audioswitch app and I found this. Thanks!

title: PlayerPro Music Player (Free)
description:
This app is a free, unlimited version of PlayerPro Music Player that will start showing ads after 10 days of usage. 

PlayerPro features a beautiful, fast and intuitive interface, alongside powerful audio configuration options. In addition, there is a choice of several free plugins to complement it: Skins, DSP Pack...

Note: PlayerPro Music Player is a standalone app. Please uninstall this free version after purchase. 

KEY FEATURES:

‚Ä¢ Browse and play your music in many different ways: by albums, artists, composers, genres, songs, playlists, folders, and album artists.

‚Ä¢ Browse and play your videos by folders.

‚Ä¢ Listen to your music while driving thanks to the built-in Android Auto (integrated into your car system) or standalone (via the Android Auto app).

‚Ä¢ Stream your music to your TV or any Chromecast Audio compatible device.

‚Ä¢ Liven up your music library with album artwork, artist/composer pictures, and genre illustrations that you can select from a variety of sources: ID3 tags (embedded artwork), SD card folders, Gallery app, and the Internet.

‚Ä¢ Change the user interface of the Player by installing one of the many available Skins.

‚Ä¢ Customize the layout, choosing between Grid or List views.

‚Ä¢ View and edit the lyrics embedded in the ID3 tags of your music files.

‚Ä¢ Single and group Tag editing: title, album, artist, album artist, composer, track, year, genre, lyrics, comment.

‚Ä¢ Default mixable audio effects: 5 band graphic equalizer with 15 default presets, stereo widening effect, reverb effects (large hall, medium hall, plate, small room, medium room, large room), bass boost effect, volume control.

‚Ä¢ Free additional professional DSP plugin: High-Res audio (up to 32-bit, 384kHz), 10 band graphic equalizer with 20 default presets, Pre-Amp control, bass boost control, stereo widening control, left-right volume control, optional mono output. Gapless playback. Auto/Manual crossfade. Replay gain. Audio Limiter. Go to Settings > Audio and select "Download DSP pack" option to install the free plugin.

‚Ä¢ Music stats and smart playlists: Recently added, Top rated, Most played, Recently played, Least played. Build additional custom playlists using the smart playlist editor and the many different criteria it offers: album, artist, genre, title, play/skip count, last played/added, rating, is a podcast, duration, year, file path etc. 

‚Ä¢ Import and export music history and ratings from your favorite desktop music player.

‚Ä¢ Music folder selection: restrict your music library to a specific folder.

‚Ä¢ Choice of 2 lock screen widgets with many customization options: unlock slider, sound toggle, skip tracks using volume buttons, swipe gestures, background selection, controls selection, time display, skin selection ...

‚Ä¢ Choice of 5 different home screen widgets (4x1, 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 4x2). All widgets are customizable and skinnable: 6 different skins available, option to display artist picture instead of album artwork, option to display ratings, shuffle/repeat controls etc.

‚Ä¢ Google Drive backup/restore: automatically backup your playlists, music stats and settings to Google Drive.

‚Ä¢ Supports most popular Scrobblers.

‚Ä¢ Sleep timer with fade out.

‚Ä¢ Share text notifications, album/artist artwork on your favorite Social Networks.

‚Ä¢ Headset support. Customize long press and double/triple press actions.

‚Ä¢ Library wide search. Voice search and Google Assistant support.

‚Ä¢ Swipe gestures: swipe album art to skip songs, double tap or long press to pause/resume playback.

‚Ä¢ Shake it feature: give your phone a shake to play next/previous song (e.g.: shake top to bottom or bottom to top to play next/previous song).


... and many other features to discover!

comments: I really like all of the different functions, especially replaying the input with the tone generator. Genius app!

Works as advertised and I will recommend it to friends and family. Thank you to the people put the effort to make available in future I will be looking first for apps from same source. To set up a pro-audio stage limitations of the phone microphone with phone hand held, come on it's not apps issue it would be the operator expecting accurate measurement .
I manage audio at a local church. I was looking for an RTA program because I want to learn more about speaker assessment.

I want to use it for two different reasons. 1) to try to get voices of spirits recorded and 2) to desifer voices of the living. Lol. That are low or muffled from the backround noices. Will it help me with either one? If so how do i do it?

Wow. Am very impressed with the wide range of features. You can switch to 24khz bandwidth, slide indicator to specific freqs, step history in 0.1sec increments, generate white, pink, gray noise etc., and switch among several views of the graphical output. Two notes: 1) tap the ellipses (...), read the question mark icon, and see what the icons do. 2) Some users complained about accuracy ... they should realize that a cell phone mic is NOT a studio reference mic. It's the hardware, not the app!

title: Music Editor
description:
Music Editor

Music Editor is a very useful Audio Editor, MP3 Cutter, Ringtone Maker, Song Editor.

With Music Editor, you can cut out a certain part of music as a ringtone, alarm tone, and notification tone.

In addition to trim audio feature, you can also use Music Editor to connect multiple audio files into one, convert audio formats, convert video to audio, compress the quality of audio, and edit audio metadata, you can also change the volume level of the audio, and more.

The most powerful and complete MP3 Editor, It has all the features you would ever want in a Music Editor.

The main features of the Audio Editor:
- Trim Audio: Crop a part of the audio as a ringtone, alarm, and notification tone.
- Merge Audio: Connect multiple audio files into one.
- Convert Audio: Change one music format to another, such as: AAC to MP3, M4A to MP3, MP3 to WAV and so on.
- My Creations: All processed audio files will be displayed here, you can re-edit, delete or share them.
- Mix Audio: You can mix two music into one, and you can also adjust the volume level of the music.
- Compress Audio: You can compress audio by changing the channel, sample rate and bit rate.
- Tag Editor: You can change metadata of audio, such as: title, album, composer, year, and cover.
- Split Audio: If you need to split an audio into two parts, you can use this feature.
- Reverse Audio: Reverse the audio and plays it in reverse.
- Speed ‚Äã‚ÄãEditor: Edit audio speed, fast forward, slow down.
- Remove Part: Remove a part of the audio.
- Mute Part: Part of the audio can be muted.
- Volume BoosterÔºöYou can change the volume level of audio.

With just the best Music Editing tool, you can do all of the above, and it's completely free, It's an excellent Audio Editor.

We welcome feedback if you have any suggestions or problems with the app, contact us at: binghuostudio@gmail.com, We always try to upgrade to give you the best MP3 Cutter and Audio Editor and the best Music Editing tool.

Download this Music Audio Editor app to experience best Audio Editing features.

comments: Super easy to use and nice. It works perfectly for mp3 cutting. I just cut a song that started for 23 secs by unrelated drums/rythm added to an original that made even the beginning unrecognizable and son a bit long.
Real simple to use. Lot of great songs out there with foul,nasty words that I don't want to hear. Easy to edit,cut,replace etc... but wouldn't need this app if the artist wouldn't use those words.

I need to increase the sound volume for bulk files, for example, all the tracks in an album. Unfortunately can't seem to select more than one at a time. Also the gallery shows all music files including those on the SD card which is good, however the file browser won't show the SD card where my files are kept. Maybe if it did, I'd be able to select multiple files? I will change this review if I've missed something and it has the functionality I need.
Does what it says it does! Super fast and easy conversions. Layout of the spp is very straight forward and user friendly!
Very engaging, easy to use and complete enough for a free app

title: Audio Swipe
description:
Audio Swipe is designed to make listening to music as easy as possible. All you need to do is swipe to change songs and adjust the volume, and tap to toggle your audio. 

The app comes with a dark mode which enables you to control your audio when your screen appears to be off. Audio Swipe also allows you to control other media players so that you can enhance your experience by swiping and tapping. An equaliser is available if you are using Audio Swipe to play your audio, which will enhance the quality of your audio experience.

comments: This app is great to use while I listen to music in the car. I don't even have to look at my phone to skip to a new song. I had trouble saving playlists, but I found that the app works with external audio apps so I can choose playlists from there anyway. It's very convenient to use and all controls are customizable. I would highly recommend this app for listening to music in situations where it is inconvenient to spend time looking at your phone. Otherwise, the capabilities are somewhat limited.

The best thing about this app is I can use its swipe controls with ALL of my music apps. AND I CAN SET MY OWN SWIPE CONTROLS!!!! FREAKING AWESOME!!!! I immediately upgraded!!! Best app I've ever downloaded!!!!

I am now experiencing silence (music stops play at 2nd or 3rd song. When bluetooh is connected to car. Only with Audio Swipe. Any recommendations?? I have to exit player... Then open up and restart it. Im not sure why it does it. Pause and then play doesnt fix it either. Can you help?? Thank you for the info! Is there an option to turn shuffle off? Every time i hit option for next track or skip it shuffles to a completely different artist. I cannot seem to be able to turn it off

Hi Hendriksen Software! I just tried your Audio Swipe app on my Galaxy Note 8. WOW, WHAT A GREAT APP! I was so impressed with it's functionality, ease of use and ability to customize settings that I upgraded to the full version right away. There is one feature that I would like to see added to this app. That would be to have the the ability to tap or swipe on the screen, and open a voice search for a specific song, album or artist. Once again, GREAT APP!

I love this app but all the sudden I can't swipe on dark mode when the screen appears to be off. I purchased the "upgrade" to have unlimmitted swiping and it still won't work. I only want the app for a safer driving expierence. So for other blondes like myself you have to use dark mode by long tapping the screen it appears off but it runs the app so you can swipe, use volume controls and pause/play your music. You can't enable the lock screen to use the app. Hope this helps someone!

Audio Recorder is no time limit, it only depends on your internal storage space or the remaining space of the SD card.
